description: The world today is all about connections with people - Sansan is how you put it all together. Sansan is a cloud based contact management system. Digitize your business cards with 99.9% accuracy and share the contact information with your colleagues. Save time and increase your business opportunities. Just by scanning, you can get the most out of your business cards both by mobile and PC. Whether you are a B2B business trying to connect up the chain with a target client, an HR firm sharing info about potential recruits across your team, or a venture looking to turn your stack of received business cards into potential investors, Sansan can help you realize the potential in sharing your business cards with your colleagues. Over 3,000 companies in all types of industries are already using Sansan's premium service. Just register with your company’s domain e-mail, and you are ready for the trial to scan, manage, and share. Checking out Sansan for the first time? Or invited by a colleague? Here’s what Sansan can do! ■Features: • Digitize: Our input staff will manually digitize your business cards with 99.9% accuracy. Just take a picture, and you’re done. • Organize: Sansan will automatically organize, classify and group your contacts. • Manage: Tag, log and review both your own and your colleagues’ contacts from your phone or PC. • Share: Easily share your contacts with your colleagues. You can search your colleagues’ records to see if someone has spoken to a given person, and when. • Contact: Contact people through email or phone apps, or send bulk emails to multiple contacts with one-touch links • Download: Export your business card data as CSVs and leverage the data in other ways • Security: Sansan is a holder of the “Privacy Mark,” and puts security above everything else, and is trusted by over 3,000 current companies in use. • Start: Our Starter Plan allows you try 10 cards for free before using the full version. • Grow: With the Storage Pack, start out with 5000 cards a for $100 dollars a month, and enjoy increased card storage to meet your business’s needs, for any industry. —> [New Sansan Trial Users] For users who are trying Sansan for the first time, register a new account with your company email address, and begin your trial.　***(We do not accept registration with free domains such as gmail and yahoo) You will receive 10 business cards worth of scanning and storage for free, and can also use the download feature. If you invite a colleague from the application, you can use up to 20 cards worth of scanning and storage. For complete inter-company business card management and scanning with Sansan, take advantage of a paid plan. Plans starting at 5000 cards of scanning and storage, and plans for using our Sansan rental scanner are available. —> [Users Invited By Colleagues] For users who were invited by their colleagues, download, then sign in to the Sansan app with your registered domain's email address and password. Once you sign in, you’ll be able to increase the amount of cards shared between you and your colleague, so both the inviter and the invitee benefit! —> [Users Whose Companies Already Purchased The Storage Pack] For users whose companies are already using Sansan’s full surface, just register your username and password, and log into the smartphone or PC application to start scanning and sharing! [Plan Pricing] Sansan charges a fee for complete use of their scanning and storage services [For Users Who Haven’t Contracted With Sansan Yet] For users not yet contracted with Sansan, you can choose a contract plan after your trial has ended - Storage Pack ・・・Scan and store up to 5,000 cards a month! $100/mo. (yearly contract) - Sansan Scanner ・・・Dedicated Scanner-touch panel set is available for rental. 1 unit per company for $100/mo. (yearly contract) For more details, please access the “Use Sansan Scanner” screen from inside the application. ———— The Business Card Box for your team Sansan

description: Songsterr is a tab app with instant access to 500,000 high quality guitar, bass and drum tabs & chords. When you buy the app, you get unlimited lifetime access to all the tabs & chords from songsterr.com website. FEATURES Tabs & Chords • Huge catalogue of accurate tabs from Songsterr.com. Unlimited instant access to 500,000 tabs & chords. • High transcription quality. There is only one version of tab per song. • Legality. Music creators get paid. Tab Player • Realistic Guitar Engine. Learn and play along with Songsterr. • Multiple Instruments. Most songs have tabs for individual instruments (guitar, bass, drums, vocal, etc). • Multi Speed Playback. Slow down tab playback to learn difficult parts. • Loop. Play back selected measures over and over again. • Offline Mode. View and playback previously opened tabs offline. • Solo. Hear just the instrument you are learning. • Count in. Gives you time to prepare yourself for playing after tapping Play. Navigation • History. Instantly access tabs you viewed recently. • Favorites. Quickly access your favorite tabs. • Favorites Syncing. Sign in with your songsterr.com account to synchronize favorites with website. Price • No hidden fees. All-in-one app with unlimited lifetime access to all the tabs & chords.

description: Interactive Steampunk skull Live wallpaper- Touch the skull to make the the bio-mechanical clockwork skull move, jaws open and gears rotate. NO ADS! Now with real steam and Gear sounds!! Steampunk refers to a subgenre of science fiction and sometimes fantasy that incorporates technology and clothing designs inspired by 19th-century industrial steam-powered machinery. If Jules Verne or H.G. Wells were writing their science fiction today, it would be considered “steampunk.” Classic "Death Card" theme for fans of Steampunk, Cyberpunk, Science fiction, Sci-Fi and retro tech goth. • Press the center of the skull to activate gears and steam on the background live wall paper • You can turn Steampunk sounds ON or Off in settings (defaults to Off) • Classic steampunk design theme for fans of Steampunk, Steam punk gears, Cyberpunk, Science fiction, Sci-Fi and retro tech goth. • If you like this, you will also like my Steampunk Gears Live Wallpaper • TO INSTALL: Home -> Menu -> Wallpaper -> Live Wallpapers- Steampunk Live Wallpaper Skull

“The World’s Top 10 Most Innovative Companies in Fitness” -Fast Company Track your runs and rides with GPS, join Challenges and see how your running and riding compares with friends. TRACK YOUR RUNS AND RIDES WITH GPS • Follow routes you’ve created or found and view your activity map as you record • Get key stats like distance, pace, speed, elevation gained and calories burned • Collect heart rate data from Bluetooth Low Energy sensors CLIMB THE LEADERBOARDS • Set personal records and see how you stack up against friends, locals and pros • Join monthly Challenges designed to push you further FOLLOW FRIENDS • Find your friends and motivate them with kudos and and comments • Share your activities on Facebook and Twitter • Share Instagram photos from your activities on your Strava profile FIND PLACES TO RUN AND RIDE • Explore the most popular segments anywhere you go GO PREMIUM • Filtered leaderboards by age and weight to see where you stack up • Set weekly mileage or time-based goals and keep track of your daily progress • Train more effectively with detailed heart rate analysis and see your Suffer Score • Get your performance results immediately after completing a segment • See which of your friends are currently out riding or running • Stay on top of your game throughout the year with training videos • Visualize your training with Power Zone and Pace Distribution analysis • Access to exclusive Premium gear, Shop discounts, and extra rewards all year • These Premium features are available through in-app purchasing Visit www.strava.com to access even more features. ------ NOTE ON GPS SUPPORT: Strava depends on GPS for recording activities. In some devices, the GPS does not work properly and Strava will not record effectively. If your Strava recordings show poor location estimation behavior, please try to update the operating system to the most recent version. We recommend running Android version 4.0.0 or above. Furthermore, there are some devices which have consistently poor performance with no known remedies. On these devices we restrict installation of Strava, for example Nexus One and HTC Hero. See our support site for more information: https://strava.zendesk.com/entries/27141334-Does-Strava-4-x-run-on-my-Android-device-
release_text: Introducing Strava Live: Your Android phone is now a running and cycling computer. ● New always-on display option, optimized for battery life, shows live performance feedback. ● Premium athletes also get live speed and paired devices data.

** PLEASE NOTE: CURRENTLY REQUIRES YOUR SCHOOL TO USE THE FIREFLY LEARNING PLATFORM ** Student Planner integrates with your school's Firefly Learning Platform so you can access your timetable and homework from your Android phone. Automatically populated from your school timetable so you don't need to enter any of your classes, and teachers can push homework directly to your planner. You can also manually add your own homework or other tasks and associate them with particular lessons and teachers. These automatically synchronise with your account on your school's Firefly Learning Platform. Features include: - View your school timetable - See homework set by your teachers - Add your own homework and tasks - Receive push notifications when teachers set you new tasks, send you messages or send you links - Access your school's Firefly system without having to log in again Please note: you will need to know your school's code to log in for the first time. Ask your teacher or network administrator if you are not sure what it is. Make suggestions and keep up to date as we develop the app by following @fireflyteam at http://twitter.com/fireflyteam The Android version of Student Planner requires your school to be running Firefly 4.0.14 or higher.
release_text: Fixed an issue with ampersands and newlines cutting off text in task descriptions.

description: Save paper, pencils and your time – play Tic Tac Toe on your Android device. Tic Tac Toe Free app is a modern version of old school game every kid used to play when he was younger. Tic Tac Toe is incredibly simple, fun and addictive game for 1 or 2 players. You can play player against Android or play with your friends or relatives. One player plays X and the other O, taking turns marking the spaces in a 3×3 grid. The player who succeeds in placing three respective marks in a horizontal, vertical, or diagonal row wins the game. In next game the winner of the previous game is the one who starts the game. If no one wins, it’s a draw. Kids and people of all ages love playing Tic Tac Toe app! Try it for yourself and you will love it! Tic Tac Toe Free app offers: - single and two player mode – play against Android or against another human - 4 different levels in single player mode; easy, medium, hard, expert - game statistics - simple design that looks great on all android devices and display sizes, including tablets - small size, less than 1MB, we don’t want to waste memory on your device like other developers do! - new game starts automatically after the previous one ends for more fun and faster playing - ultrafast response times of Android player - hours of fun for you, your kids, friends and relatives - perfect for wasting time while on the way to school or work - takes less than 1min to finish the game so perfect game for those who do not have much free time - kids love it and keeps them occupied for hours! Tic-Tac-Toe originates back to ancient Egypt and is one of the oldest games known to men. Tic Tac Toe can be also called Tic-tac-toe, TicTacToe, TTT, noughts and crosses, X's and O's and X and 0 or: - Tick-tack-toe, tic-tac-toe, tick-tat-toe, or tit-tat-toe (USA, Canada) - Noughts and crosses or Naughts and crosses (Great Britain, Republic of Ireland, Australia, New Zealand, South Africa) - Exy-Ozys, Xsie-Osies (verbal name only) (Northern Ireland) - Xs and Os (Egypt, Republic of Ireland, Canada, Scotland, Zimbabwe) - X and O (India) - O-X (Mauritius)

description: "Tokyo Fashion", is the official Android app of TokyoFashion.com - the most popular English-language Japanese street fashion website in the world. 550,000+ Facebook fans and 70,000+ Twitter followers can't be wrong! The free "Tokyo Fashion" app - for phones and tablets - features daily updated street snaps from Harajuku, Shibuya, and other areas of Tokyo, Japanese fashion news, fashion brand profiles, Tokyo shop info, real-time updates from various social networks (Facebook, Twitter, etc) and much more. You can also set Tokyo street snaps as wallpaper on your phone/tablet. The free custom wallpapers can be set via simple mode or with more advanced options! Besides the daily news and street fashion pictures, the Tokyo Fashion Android app also provides you with photos and reports from special fashion events around Tokyo - including the Japan Fashion Week in Tokyo, Harajuku Kawaii (featuring Kyary Pamyu Pamyu) and Tokyo Girls Collection fashion shows. The Tokyo Fashion app is meant to keep you up-to-date while inspiring you and giving you ideas for your daily style. If you have any interest in fashion - or in the amazing megalopolis that is Tokyo - this free app is a must-have! You can share your comments on Japanese fashion with other users right inside of the app. In case you're wondering what you might find inside, the Tokyo Fashion app includes many different types of fashion and subcultures like Dolly Kei, Fairy Kei, Visual Kei, Gothic Lolita, Sweet Lolita, Decora, Cosplay, and Gyaru. Popular brands and shops that we often post pictures from include Shibuya 109, LaForet, 6%DOKIDOKI, Angelic Pretty, Baby The Stars Shine Bright, Dog, BAPE, Undercover, Comme des Garcons, Spank, Galaxxxy, Grimoire, Vivienne Westwood, Spinns, Uniqlo, Hysteric Glamour, Jeremy Scott, Liz Lisa, Takeshita Dori stores, and many more. This is just a small taste of what you might see on any given day! Future versions of this app - already in development - will feature even higher resolution pictures as several other improvements to the street snap section. Future versions will include shopping maps of Tokyo, even more detailed brand information, and other features still in development. Please visit the support site (or our Facebook page) to suggest improvements and new features that you'd like to see. We want to make this app everything you've ever dreamed of - and more!
release_text: Another update! - Improved images on many tablets - more crisp and pretty! - Twitter and Facebook code updates. - Bug fixes and improved code. - You can now set any street snap as a wallpaper on your phone or tablet! - Street snaps now load faster and don't require any clicks - just scroll and more snaps appear! - Please send us your feedback and suggestions - we need your help!

description: La aplicación Torno te permite controlar el tiempo que has estado trabajando fácilmente. Además te permite exportar los datos en varios formatos para poder procesarlos posteriormente. Incluye un widget para que fichar te resulte más fácil. The application lets you control lathe time you've been working easily. It also lets you export data in various formats for further processing. Includes a widget for you to sign easier.
release_text: Se han añadido dos nuevas opciones. Una para poder configurar el horario con horas de entrada mínima y hora de salida máxima. También se puede seleccionar un intervalo de horas que no serán computables en caso de tener que descontar tiempo por comida, desayuno, etc...

description: TransitWidget allows you to view real-time predictions for bus stops in a widget on your home or lock screen from the MBTA, MTA, SF Muni and many other transit agencies (anything supported by NextBus!) - Widgets are configured to update during a specific time of day or when tapped, so they won't drain your battery when you don't need them. - Updating notifications are provided, so you can get the time to the next bus from the notification panel. - For an even better experience, use WidgetLocker to put your transit widgets on the lock screen and you'll have access to them just by pressing the power button. Upcoming Features: - More configurable widgets (disable notifications, etc...) Feedback: Have a suggestion or comment about the app? Please let me know at support@john.sh
release_text: v1.1 - 11/17/2012 Fixed a bug preventing real-time predictions from loading for some routes.

description: Never miss an upload, stay notified! Tube Alert is the world’s first to send you live notifications on your mobile device when your favorite YouTubers upload a video! Add your favorite YouTubers to Tube Alert's favorite list and when the YouTube channels in the favorite list upload, you'll get a live notification. You will never miss your favorite YouTube videos again! Tube Alert provides access to all genres of YouTube videos you can watch; ranging from music videos to gaming videos. Tube Alert created a new YouTube reward platform by rewarding “Tube Points” for completing certain tasks that the fans regularly do to assist the content creators (YouTubers). These tasks include, but are not limited to, opening the app, liking a video, subscribing to a channel, sharing a video and/or channel and much more. The Tube Points will be saved to the user’s account and can be redeemed on Tube Alert’s Store (currently in Beta) for virtual and real life rewards. -Additional Features- • Discover Feature: Easily discover new YouTube channels to your liking • Custom YouTube Video Player: All new look with easy to use features • Home Page: View your favorite YouTuber's most recent videos • Top 25 Feature: Help your favorite YouTuber get on the Top 25 • Manage and enjoy all of your YouTube Playlists • Search for your favorite YouTubers and specific Videos • Earn “Tube Points” for performing various tasks to redeem in the Tube Alert Store • Multiple Language Support: English, Spanish, Portuguese, Polish Enhance Your Subscriptions -Tube Alert http://tubealert.com/
release_text: Tube Alert's engineers are hard at work improving your YouTube experience! Keep your feedback coming! • BRAND NEW STORE!!! We think you'll like what's in-store for you, no pun intended. • New, easy to use design • Fixed Login Issues so you can now login with a sub-account • Improved stability and speed of application Thanks again for using Tube Alert - even when we had some annoying bugs in the past. Now go and enjoy some videos!

description: TV Shows will simplify your life. If you want to know when to watch your favorite shows, add them and TV Shows will tell you when to watch them! This is NOT an application to watch shows! Features: - see when your favorite shows will be aired - list of all episodes - details about each episode - add reminders in status bar - add episodes to calendar (with reminder) - tell a friend about an episode - see the list of upcoming shows directly in the Widget - mark episodes as seen - save information about the episodes on your SD Card to access them offline
release_text: - corrected the bug of images not loading - corrected the bug with info not loading

description: Enjoy the benefits of an indoor cycling class in the convenient form of an Android application, with Indoor Cycling Coach. Build stamina, strength, speed and endurance, using routines designed to maximise the productivity of your workout. Choose the routine type, choose the duration, choose a playlist of tunes...and then you're good to go. Indoor Cycling Coach will display the RPM at which you should be pedalling and the amount of resistance you should be using. Adjust the resistance level of your bike to the indicated degree of difficulty, and match your pedal speed with that of the on-screen wheel. Like a real indoor cycling class the instructions will change at set periods, to simulate the efforts required for, say, a gruelling up-hill climb, a thigh-burning sprint, or a simple, gentle warm-up. The routines contained within Indoor Cycling Coach are dynamically generated, dependent on the type and duration of the routine you select. These routines were designed by Simon Reynolds, who, through the benefits of indoor cycling combined with a carefully controlled diet guided by the LighterLife* programme, shed 16 stone in 6 months. By practically halving his initial 33 stone body weight, Simon has become an ambassador for the world of indoor cycling, and Indoor Cycling Coach is his way of spreading the benefits to others. * For more information on LighterLife, please visit www.lighterlife.com. NB. Certain devices (for example, the Samsung Galaxy S2 pre ICS) have a default media player app which does not create music playlists correctly. This is a known flaw in these devices, which will mean that these playlists will not be available within Indoor Cycling Coach. The accepted workaround is to download an alternative media player application (we recommend Winamp Free) and use that to create your playlists instead. For more information please read: http://flemmingbob.blogspot.com/2012/04/my-samsung-galaxy-s2-wont-find-my.html
release_text: Latest android release permission fix for nexus series mobile phones. Improvements for image caching.

description: Download our new and improved ULTA app to take your love for beauty and everything fabulous on the go with our effortless new mobile experience! View our special offers and savings and easily access your ULTAmate Rewards information. It's easier than ever to see what's new and shop for everything beauty conveniently from your phone! • Shop quickly – fast, seamless checkout means super-speedy shopping anytime, anywhere • Access your ULTAmate Rewards account for full account details including easy access to your points balance and rewards number • Access your ULTA.com account to see your past purchases and favorite products • Buy products and gift cards, read reviews, discover exclusive offers and more • Search for information by category, brand, price, top-selling, and new arrivals • Scan your favorite product to gather info, ratings and reviews and product Q&A while shopping in our stores • Use your GPS or enter a ZIP code to find nearby stores • Share your favorite products and fabulous looks, even upload your own photos! • Access our weekly ad and mailers for latest sales, exclusive offers, and fabulous new products

---This is a version for beta-testers, please don't rate it low. This game is under heavy development so several updates a day will be expected--- A new era of Music Quiz Games as just begun!!! Remember the old times when Music Quiz Games were based on questions or on your SD-Card Music? Those times are over!!!! In Ultimate Music Quiz you can play with musics from a Last.fm Username, a Artist/Band or from a Last.fm Tag. For example, if you choose tho play with the tag Rock or Pop the songs that you have to guess are that ones that were tagged in Last.fm as Rock or Pop. Are you a 60s or 80s music lover? Just choose 60s or 80s as the tag. Here you can see the Top Tags in Last.fm ( http://www.last.fm/charts/toptags ) Known Issues: - In time when passing from 01 to 00 it takes 2 seconds - It's only optimized for HVGA (320x480) - Sometimes appears songs that are not related with the tag, or artist - If the name as a & sometimes don't appear the text after the & - Some state buttons images are missing - In artist game mode sometimes it gets stuck, you have to go back several times to give force close or kill the app - Some songs appear repeatedly in one game - The Options button does not work --ATTENTION - Each game of UMQ generates about 20MB of data, so it recommended that you use a Wi-fi connection-- The High Scores are powered by ScoreLoop and this Game is Ad Supported. In final version High Scores will be reseted. I want to make Ultimate Music Quiz the best Music Quiz for Android, and for that I'll need your help. All feedback are welcome and will be taken in consideration even in Android Market Comments. And remember, don't rate it low and take in consideration that this is my firt game for Android and it is in a early beta stage.

app_name: urecy グループでスケジュール共有 カレンダー共有アプリ
description: urecy(ウレシイ)はカップル、友だち、家族などプライベート向けのグループ共有アプリです。 グループ内ではカレンダーでスケジュール共有、メモや写真の共有、ツイートができます。 ************************* こんな人におすすめ ************************* 家族でスケジュール共有をしたい 夫婦で家事、育児の予定を分担したい 夫婦で子供の予定を共有したい カップル同士でスケジュールや記念日を共有をしたい 職場でお客さまの予約状況を共有したい 友だちと部活やサークルなどのスケジュールを共有したい 限られた人だけでコミュニケーションのとれるスペースが欲しい ************************* 特徴 ************************* ■コルクボードでメモや写真を共有 コルクボードにはメモ、写真を貼り付けてグループのメンバーで共有ができます。 コルクボードに貼付けることでタイムラインのようにあっという間に流れてしまう事がありません。 スケジュール調整や連絡の告知など使い方は自由です。 ■カレンダーで予定を共有 カレンダーを使えばグループのメンバーと簡単に予定を共有できます。 友達の予定を確認済みにマークするとき、自分のiPhoneのカレンダーにも保存することもできるので、 ネットにつながらない場合に確認できて便利です。 ■手書きツイートで感情豊かなコミュニケーション 手書き機能でカラフルで感情豊かなツイートができるようになりました。 テキストだけでは物足りない！そんなときは手書きツイートを作ってみましょう。 おなじみの顔文字もカラフルに自由にレイアウトできるので、より感情豊かなコミュニケーションができます。 ■10人まで urecy(ウレシイ)は友だち、カップル、家族、夫婦などプライベートな関係向けに作られています。 そのため、グループは最大10人の人数制限があります。 ココだけの話は気の許せる人たちと楽しみましょう。 ■フェードアウト機能 何かしらの理由で疎遠になってしまったグループからは自然にフェードアウトします。 グループ内でのツイート、コルクボードへの貼付けなどの活動(アクティビティ)が一定期間無い場合、フェードアウトの対象となります。 進学、引っ越し、転職など人生の転機に出会いと別れはつきものです。 urecyはユーザーのリアルな人間関係に自然にフィットするようになっています。 ************************* 機能 ************************* グループ毎に以下のことができます。 ・手書きツイート NEW! ・添付画像を手書き編集 NEW! ・ツイート ・ツイートに写真を添付 ・ツイートに位置情報を付ける ・カレンダーでスケジュールの共有 ・スケジュールを端末のカレンダーに登録 ・コルクボードでテキストメモの共有 ・コルクボードで写真の共有 ・お知らせ グループ内で発生した各種イベントがお知らせとして通知されます。 urecy (nice) is a group of private sharing app for couples, friends, and family. Schedule shared calendar, share photos and notes, you can tweet within a group. ************************* It is recommended for such a person ************************* I want to schedule a family shares I want to share the housework schedule, childcare in couple I want to share the schedule of children in married couples I want to share the anniversary schedule and a couple to each other I want to share the availability of our customers at work I want to share the schedule of club activities or the circle and friends I want the space to take the communication only people with limited ************************* Feature ************************* ■ Share photos and notes in cork board You can share with members of the group by pasting notes, photos on cork board. There is not that it flows quickly as the timeline by affix the cork board. How to use including notice of contact and schedule adjustment is free. ■ Share an appointment in calendar You can share the plan easily with members of the group if I use the calendar. When you mark the confirmed schedule of friends, it can also be saved to the calendar of their iPhone, You may find it useful to have seen when you are not connected to the net. ■ emotional communication by hand tweet Tweet rich emotion can now be colorful by hand function. Unsatisfactory only text! Let's try to make the handwriting tweet in such a case. Because I can freely layout the colorful characters familiar face, you can communicate more emotional. ■ up to 10 people (nice) are made to the relationship for a private friends, couples, families, and couples urecy. Kokodakenohanashi Let's enjoy with the people you forgive the mind. ■ fade-out feature I will fade out naturally from the group had been estranged for some reason. College, moving, meeting and parting is inherent in turning point of life, such as career change. urecy has adapted to fit naturally in human relations realistic user. ************************* Function ************************* I can do the following for each group. · Handwriting Tweet NEW! • The handwriting edit the attached image NEW! · Tweet - Attach photos to tweet -I put a location to tweet And sharing of schedule in calendar • The registration of the terminal to the calendar schedule And sharing of text noted in cork board And sharing of photos in cork board · Announcements Various events that have occurred within the group will be notified as inform.

description: Teacher Review "As a teacher, I find many obstacles in finding the perfect medium in which to share information with my students. This often includes hours of searches, you tube searches, etc. This app is amazing! It takes those hours I used to spend and turns them into seconds with one touch of this app. I love it! Thanks again for creating such an awesome app that gives me hours of my life back! " In the information age of today education, learning and teaching is changing fast. The technology that is being used in and outside of the classroom is everywhere. Almost every student has a cell phone with access to the Internet. Even with out Internet access there are educational applications for iPhone, iPad,. The methods for teaching students and special needs students are expanding. Some schools are going all iPad. Meaning all students will have iPads with digital textbooks and new learning tools. For students these types of applications can be very useful. The student who cannot focus on one type of learning at a time can flip back and fourth through the app to stay focused. The student who is an extremely visual learner will be attracted to the devices colorful screen of pictures in the lesson. The student who has trouble writing notes or preparing them self for a test can simply open up previous lessons and practice on the interactive quizzes of the apps. The student who is a auditory learner can listen to nature sounds while reviewing topics or watch videos related to each topic. The very high performing student can find interesting topic related daily news and summarize it for the class. All of these options can be utilized through one educational app. U.S. History Regents Buddy is the ultimate tool for learning history. This app was designed by a teacher who has used all possible multimedia resources in the classroom for teaching regents curriculum. U.S. History Regents Buddy is not only an app for learning U.S. History but also a app for teachers. The features of this app makes studying extremely convenient. This app is the ultimate learning tool for all students taking U.S. History. This app covers all topics in NYS regents US history and AP US history. This app gives the opportunity to study and become very knowledgeable about US history. This app includes Topics covered on this app are: 1. US Geography 2. 1792-1800 Election Results 3. French and Indian War 4. Road to Revolution 5. American Revolution 6. War Of 1812 7. Era Of Good Feeling 8. Early 19c America 9. Andrew Jackson 10. Chesapeake Colonization 11. Election Of 1840 12. Restoration Colonies 13. New England Colonization 14. Antebellum American Art 15. Antebellum Reformers 16. Antebellum South 17. IndustrializationIn America 18. Election Of 1844 19. 1850s Road To Secession 20. Manifest Destiny 21. Civil War 22. Atrocities Of The Civil War 23. Late 19c Urbanization 24. Reconstruction 25. Gilded Age Politics 26. Populism and the Election of 1896 27. Rise Of Big Business 28. Growth Of The Labor Movement 29. America an Imperial Power 30. Life In Gilded Age NYC 31. American Foreign Policy 1920-1941 32. Beginning of Cold War 33. Eisenhower-Foreign Policy 34. Election Of 1912 35. Closing The Western Frontier 36. 1950s American Culture 37. The Vietnam War This app would be ideal for classrooms with iPads because it has the resources to prepare for a regents or to present a lesson. All the regents buddy apps are available on the app store and have been helping teachers and students since their release.

description: Celestial Navigator is a must have app for mariners and any other person interested in celestial navigation. It features a rise set and merpass calculator, a line of position and compass error including gyro calculator , a celestial fix calculator (with auto run up and dead reckoning),an almanac of sun,moon,planets and 58 navigational stars.It supports the three most widely used navigational methods for calculation of lines of position i.e. intercept,long by chronometer and latitude by meridian altitude. It also features a true wind calculator (giving wind speed and direction,dew point and relative humidity),an eta calculator (multiple results are shown at a time depending upon the user settings),a sailing calculator featuring great circle and Mercator sailing calculators along with intermediate point calculator. It also displays the device's position(lat,long,speed,cog) from the GPS and the compass heading. The accuracy of the results displayed has been thoroughly tested with the US navy website, the nautical almanac of 2013.The results are with in 10-15 seconds which is accurate enough for sea. Baking and Cooking Recipes In the culinary category there are also two basic classes of people as I see it: the Bakers and the Cooks. Baking is a very precise science. Flour, sugar, salt, baking powder, soda, milk, buttermilk, flavorings, shortening, oil, butter or other ingredients are used in a variety of ways in baked goods recipes, but they interact with each other in very specific ways. Measurements have to be precise or it's disasterville in the kitchen. Commercial bakers even weigh their ingredients to assure they're using just the right amount. Cookbooks have recipes that are tested and re-tested until the directions shown, if followed, will result in a tasty dish. There is very little room for personal variations unless the baker has a great deal of experience. When we see a famous chef on TV appearing to simply mix in this and that in a somewhat carefree manner, it's just because he or she has put in a great deal of time learning basic measurements and techniques that yield that mouth-watering masterpiece. When you're looking for something quick, easy, and yummy to prepare as a breakfast treat you can never go wrong with a quick bread. A quick bread doesn't require yeast. Instead it uses other leaveners such as baking... While various baking powders were sold in the first half of the 19th century, our modern variants were discovered by Alfred Bird in 184August Oetker, a German pharmacist, made baking powder very popular when he began selling his mixture to housewives. The recipe he created in 1891 is still sold as Backin in Germany. Oetker started the mass production of baking powder in 1898 and patented his technique in 1903. It takes a lot of stuff to bake. There are all of the ingredients that make up the dishes. There are also all of the pots and pans and bowls that are necessary for different stages of baking. Lastly, there are the mixers and food processors and other technology that are either necessary or extremely helpful. For those who aren’t sure what is needed, websites such as the one for the Food Network as well as other sites can tell you all the essential items. And finding baking supplies has never been easier. Many areas have large kitchen stores that stock all kinds of equipment and accessories. For everything else, websites like amazon.com and a few others will help you fill in the gaps. Even the local supermarket often has a lot of the baking supplies that are commonly used. Once you get all of the supplies, the baking can commence.

Godinterest (the Christian version of Pinterest) allows Christians to collect and share photos of their favourite events, interests and hobbies. Godinterest acts as a bespoke Christian media platform, whereby users' content and the content of others can be browsed on the main page of the Godinterest beta app. _____________________________________ CHRISTIAN SOCIAL NETWORKING PLATFORM Inspired by the Need for Wholesome Content Sharing, Godinterest Offers a Pinterest alternative for those who want to share within a Christian environment. In the same way that Pinterest works Godinterest is a photo-driven platform. MISSION: Godinterest's mission is to connect Christians through the interests they share. Users can upload images and embed videos to boards, which can be used to organise images they love from around the web or from their very own work. BETA APP: Godinterest Beta App is a fun way to capture and share God's world in moments with family and friends. FEATURES: • Access to mobile version of site • Enables login or registration with Facebook, Twitter or LinkedIn profiles • Allows you to take and upload photos directly from your mobile device or add YouTube video links. • Browse daily "Hot", "New" and "Top" rated photos • Comment on "photos" • Free registration includes access to all of the website's features. As this is a beta app, to access the full features of Godinterest login via a desktop computer at http://godinterest.com . _____________________________________ For those who want to maintain their Christian values while still interacting with those on the Internet, Godinterest could be a great option. With comparable features to Pinterest offered in a platform that is marketed as being safe for the entire family, the environment offered on Godinterest could be just what the Christian community is searching for. Capture and Share God's World in Moments _____________________________________ Website: http://Godinterest.com . Facebook page: http://facebook.com/godinterestUK Twitter page: http://twitter.com/godinterestUK Help Centre: godinterest.uservoice.com _____________________________________ Terms of use and Privacy Policy: http://godinterest.com/terms-of-use

About GooseTheArtist.com's app: I got my start when I was 5 drawing Spider-Man which quickly escalated in me making comics of my own. Not long after that I began practicing portraiture at a young age using the realistic techniques from that in more conceptual, dark and politically themed works. I have studied at Butler High School, Art Academy of Cincinnati and The Kentucky Center Governor’s School for the Arts. I am currently in my senior year of high school. Big things to come. Mark James on John Faughender - ” As a gallery owner, I have young people approach me regularly, wanting me to recognize their talent as the next great artist. I patiently explore their work, and offer what critique i can to help them grow. The critique is more often than not received as a rejection. I was introduced to John Faughender by a mutual friend who raved about him enough that I had my expectations set on more of the same. John arrived with a prepared portfolio, and the ability to discuss his art both conceptually and technically. As we explored his presentation, I came to see that John really had the potential to achieve greatness. My gallery focuses on finding artists that want to produce shows making relevant social commentary more so than technically adept pretty pictures or accessory art. John’s portfolio did not fit this profile, but his desire to learn and excel drove him to explore this idea, and after 2 rejected proposals, presented me with a concept, prepared sketches, and a willingness to take direction that resulted in his being given a solo show in April 2014. John is the artist that creates daily, explores the construct of his birth as an imperfect creation, and seeks to expose himself to the World through his creations. I have no doubt he will be the rare artist that matures early and becomes capable of showing the World to itself.

Любишь новые знакомства или ищешь новых друзей? А может ты хочешь найти страничку красотки или красавца из соседнего дома? Мы поможем тебе! Приложение "Мы рядом" делает поиск фото Вконтакте рядом с тобой простым и удобным. Ежедневно многие пользователи социальных сетей загружают фотографии на свои страницы и если EXIF данные этих фото содержат координаты (данные о местоположении), она отобразится на карте! Многие мобильные устройства при съемке фотографии вносят в нее данные о гео-позиции. Ты сможешь увидеть место где эта фотография была сделана, и ссылку на страницу того кто её выложил на свою страницу. ***Обращаем ваше внимание, что все отображаемые фотографии берутся только из открытых, общедоступных альбомов. В приложении присутствует удобный поиск. Можно отфильтровать результаты по полу, возрасту, дате публикации и т.д. Есть возможность исключить из поиска страницы в статусе которых указано "Замужем/Женат", "Помолвлен(а)", а так же пользователей у которых личные сообщения открыты только для друзей. Мы планируем и дальше расширять функционал приложения, чтобы вы возвращались к нему снова и снова, а для этого нам очень нужны ваши отзывы. Загружайте, делитесь впечатлениями, ставьте оценки, и не забывайте: Мы рядом! Do you like to meet new people, or are looking for new friends? Or maybe you want to find a page or handsome beauty of the house next door? We'll help you! Appendix "We are close," makes searching photos FaceBook near you simple and convenient. Every day, many social network users upload photos to your pages and if EXIF ​​data of the photo contains the coordinates (location information), it will be displayed on the map! Many mobile devices when taking a picture make it data on geo-position. You'll be able to see the place where the photo was taken, and a link to a page that someone posted it on your page. *** Please note that all images displayed are taken only from open, public albums. In the appendix there is an easy search. You can filter the results by gender, age, date of publication, etc. It is possible to exclude from the search page in the status that shows "Married / Married," "Engaged (s)", as well as users who have private messages visible only to friends. We plan to further expand the functionality of the application, so that you come back to it again and again, and for that we really need your feedback. Upload, share experiences, put the estimates and do not forget: We are close!

description: "Pregnancy Week Reminder" is a widget app, which shows you the current pregnancy week in home screen. You can get your date easily by glancing your phone. Besides, there is a due date calculator in setting activity. The data is refresh every 1 hour. No background service running to save your battery power. ========================================================= Version 1.1 change log Fix issue(s): 1. Italic style Updated: 1. Change min reminder text size from 5 to 10 2. Change reminder text edit to single line mode Enhancement: 1. Add code to handle date exception, which out of normal range ( 0 day ~ 340 days)

WhatsApp Messenger is a messaging app available for Android and other smartphones. WhatsApp uses your phone’s Internet connection (4G/3G/2G/EDGE or Wi-Fi, as available) to message and call friends and family. Switch from SMS to WhatsApp to send and receive messages, calls, photos, videos, and Voice Messages. First year FREE!* (WhatsApp may charge thereafter, current price is $0.99 USD/year). WHY USE WHATSAPP: • NO ADDITIONAL FEES: WhatsApp uses your phone’s Internet connection (4G/3G/2G/EDGE or Wi-Fi, as available) to message and call friends and family, so you don’t have to pay for every message or call.* • MULTIMEDIA: Send and receive photos, videos, and Voice Messages. • WHATSAPP CALLING: Call your friends and family using WhatsApp for free, even if they’re in another country. WhatsApp calls use your phone’s Internet connection rather than your cellular plan’s voice minutes.* (Note: you can’t access 911 and other emergency service numbers through WhatsApp). • GROUP CHAT: Enjoy group chats with your contacts so you can easily stay in touch with your friends or family. • WHATSAPP WEB: You can also send and receive WhatsApp messages right from your computer’s browser. • NO INTERNATIONAL CHARGES: There’s no extra charge to send WhatsApp messages internationally. Chat with your friends around the world and avoid international SMS charges.* • SAY NO TO USERNAMES AND PINS: Why bother having to remember yet another username or PIN? WhatsApp works with your phone number, just like SMS, and integrates seamlessly with your phone’s existing address book. • ALWAYS LOGGED IN: With WhatsApp, you’re always logged in so you don’t miss messages. No more confusion about whether you’re logged in or logged out. • QUICKLY CONNECT WITH YOUR CONTACTS: Your address book is used to quickly and easily connect you with your contacts who have WhatsApp so there’s no need to add hard-to-remember usernames. • OFFLINE MESSAGES: Even if you miss your notifications or turn off your phone, WhatsApp will save your recent messages until the next time you use the app. • AND MUCH MORE: Share your location, exchange contacts, set custom wallpapers and notification sounds, email chat history, broadcast messages to multiple contacts at once, and more! *Data charges may apply. Contact your provider for details. --------------------------------------------------------- We’re always excited to hear from you! If you have any feedback, questions, or concerns, please email us at: android-support@whatsapp.com or follow us on twitter: http://twitter.com/WhatsApp @WhatsApp ---------------------------------------------------------
release_text: • Updated the design of WhatsApp. • WhatsApp Calling: Call your friends and family using WhatsApp for free, even if they’re in another country. WhatsApp calls use your phone’s Internet connection rather than your cellular plan’s voice minutes. Data charges may apply.

description: Math Square is a puzzle that requires formation of mathematical equations, the aim is to work out where each number goes to solve the equations. Word Search displays a matrix of characters, where you have to find the hidden words given at bottom of the matrix. Select the word by touching the starting character and drag your finger to complete the word. If the word selected is correct, it will highlight that word. There is also a crossword game. The clues are on the bottom of the screen.

Where have you been? This application provides brief information for 292 countries, territories and islands (all the countries of the world). This includes capital, population, area, language, currency, time zone, dialing code and electricity details. It also includes over 550 sites that you may visit (13 categories - buildings, deserts, oceans, wonders of the world, US states, etc). Tick the places you have visited, and review the statistics. Please contact me if you wish to have sites added!

** Selected by Google as Editors’ Choice and downloaded more than 8 million times worldwide. ** Elevate is a brain training program designed to improve focus, speaking skills, processing speed, memory, math skills, and more. Each person is provided with his or her own personalized training program that adjusts over time to maximize results. The more you train with Elevate, the more you’ll improve critical cognitive skills that are proven to boost productivity, earning power, and self-confidence. Users who train at least 3 times per week have reported dramatic gains and increased confidence. FEATURES * 30+ games for critical cognitive skills like focus, memory, processing, math, precision, and comprehension * Detailed performance tracking * Personalized daily workouts that include the skills you need most * Adaptive difficulty progression to ensure your experience is challenging * Workout calendar to help you track your streaks and stay motivated * And more! IN THE NEWS CNET “Elevate comes out ahead” in the battle of the brain training apps. Wall Street Journal Compared with other brain training apps, “I prefer Elevate the most.” Washington Post Elevate is a “cognitive pick-me-up” with games that are “good for mental breaks throughout the workday.” RESEARCH BEHIND ELEVATE Elevate's games are designed in collaboration with experts in neuroscience and cognitive learning and are based on extensive scientific research. Elevate’s brain training algorithms further focus the learning experience by drawing from research in memory studies to develop a personalized training program for each user.

description: Take a breathtaking 3D ride on your way to meet with an extraterrestrial, then soar at light speed through majestic spiral galaxies and nebulas. With incredible 3D effects that will have you submerged in the mysteries of the cosmos, this app is designed with hypnotic visual effects, ideal for meditation. It is possible to meditate and free the mind from all thoughts by concentrating on any of the visuals. This visual stimulation tool contains 12 space related 3D visuals. These are also available as live wallpapers, which can be downloaded for FREE from this app. With the touch of a button, you’ll be transported into deep space. Change the speed of your voyage through space simply by touching the upper and lower parts of the screen. Visualizations of morphing galaxies with ever changing star formations are included. These animations are inspired by formulas and patterns from galaxy formations. View the galaxies as they shift, morph, collapse and expand. A visualization of a gamma ray burst is also included. These are the brightest and most powerful events in the universe, emitting flashes of rays from extremely energetic explosions in distant galaxies. From the convenience of your mobile phone or tablet, you’ll be drawn in by the mesmerizing visuals as you are taken on a fantastical journey through space and time from wherever you are: work, home or even travelling. The full version is a music visualizer, which syncs the visuals with your favorite music. The full version has no commercials. xedgarwertXpjk
release_text: You can now send the app to your friends, so they can enjoy it too. It is possible to share it through Facebook, Twitter or any other social media. Cosmic voyage and Interstellar flight has been improved.

description: Five Hundred (500) is a fun and addictive 4 player card game with 2 teams of 2 players (3 CPU players). Teams bid how many tricks they think they will win and get rewarded points if they make their bid. The first team to reach 500 points wins. Features: - Extensive how to play guide. - All bid types available (including Closed Misere and Open Misere). - Advanced CPU players. - Ability to change individual CPU player difficulties. - Different table styles. If you have any suggestions, issues or other feedback, please email me at crazzledazzledev@gmail.com and if necessary I will try to get an update out asap. Enjoy playing Five Hundred! NOTE: If you are having problems with winning the bid you need to go to your phone's Settings->Developer Options and turn "Don't keep activities" to OFF. Five Hundred uses multiple activities so having this ON will cause problems. These settings should only be altered by developers for the purpose of testing apps. if your aim is to not keep apps in memory then get an app killer because your messing with the wrong thing! Keywords: Five Hundred 500 bridge card cards game spades hearts clubs diamonds euchre bidding bid trumps trick tricks
release_text: Increased card size for 7 inch tablet users.

description: -- For users of the free version -- » To transfer the history data from the free app to the payment one, you have to finish setting up the payment app before uninstalling the free one. Otherwise data will be lost. Please, before giving us a bad score for an error, we prefer that you warn us. We will try to fix them as soon as possible. Do not pay more on your phone bill. Control Your Calls + will be your greatest ally if: » You have a plan with a number of free minutes. » You can send some free SMS. » You need to monitor your internet data consumption. » You are not sure if your mobile contract fits your actual consumption. Control Your Calls + is just what you need. Very easy to set up and use, it will become one of your essential applications in no time. -- How does it work? -- » Every time you make a call, the application will inform you of the remaining time you have left. » During a call, you will receive a vibrating alert when you have consumed 25%, 50%, 75%, 98% and 100% of the available time, this way you won't exceed the limit of your rate even if you're talking. » If you have exceeded the limit, to make a new call you will be ask to continue. » Sets vip numbers for calls and sms (sms and calls that are free). » You can control the number of SMS sent, and Internet data consumption, everything in a very visual way. » The app has widgets. » Control different types of rates:    · Minutes for all calls.    · Distinguishing minutes by fixed and mobile calls (currently only for Spain).    · Distinguishing minutes by calls on weekends, and on weekdays. » And all this is very easy to configure. -- Why should I buy the application, if there is a free one? -- » Think that the app is not an expense but an investment. Once the app will help you not to overcome the limit of your fee, you will have already saved more than it costs. » The app price is approximately the cost of a coffee in Spain (1,20€ is what we receive from the total amount). We think it is a reasonable price and it will help us to continue improving the app. » You pay for the app only once, all the updates are included, even if you change your mobile phone, if you use the same gmail account. » The payment app includes controlling Internet data consumption and desktop widgets. » Includes new fees, such as separating the minutes of calls made on a weekend, the weekday. » Improved interface. » All new future features will be included on the payment version. The free app will only receive bug fixes. -- Required permissions -- » Access to read contact details (for the call history). » Intercept outgoing calls (warnings). » Make phone calls (continue a call after the warning of limit reached). » Read sms for having statistics of the sent sms. -- Privacy -- » The data handled by such applications are quite sensitive (your phonebook contacts, calls, sms, etc). All data used by Control Your Calls + remain on your phone. You can verify this by checking that the application does not need permission to connect to the internet. » Always check the permissions used by applications, they tell you what the apps can do on your phone. Please write to android@creativemad.com for any suggestion or error that you want to comment us, included translation issues. Disclaimer: We are not responsible for any problems caused by improper operation of the application. Keywords: saving, bill, phone, flat rate, calls, control, expense, mobile notifications, free, fee, sms, data internet consume.
release_text: Version 2.18.0 » Added text widgets for available and consumed time. » Added an option to configure the action when tapping over a widget: open the app or update data.

description: You are a head of a company or a sales manager. You sell products or services trying to increase sales. Where do you keep your contacts? On sheets of paper? Do you put them in a day planner? In Excel? That's already all in the past. Let us introduce a fundamentally new product: Smarty CRM! This is a complete and intuitive tool to maintain the loyalty of your partners. With its help you can manage a database, set reminders, and record collaboration milestones. It even works offline. Opportunities — Personal and business contacts — Chats, communication with clients and partners — Goals (the system of setting goals) — Notes — Diary and organizer — NEW! File storage (available in the web version on smartycrm.com) — NEW! Import contacts from * .xls (available in the web version on smartycrm.com) Your work with each client (whether you like it or not) goes through a series of stages: establishing a new contact, identification of needs, presentation of a product, and so on. These are the basics of marketing — it is always this way, even if you have not thought about it. Smarty CRM allows you to see at what stage the client is, and suggests what activities are needed all in English. Smarty CRM has an understandable and easy-to-read interface, well-designed filters, and convenient searching. Your business can be seen at a glance. Set a reminder for a call or a meeting directly from the contact card with just a few taps. And your device will remind you about the event. Smarty CRM is a classic free cloud service enabling you to work online on Android as well as via a web browser. Synchronize data with the server and be sure that they will not be lost. If you encounter difficulties, contact us. We'll promptly help you deal with the problem or fix the errors. With Smarty CRM you will love your job as much as we do!

Travelling to Croatia? Having difficulties planning your trip searching for ferry schedules and route maps? Or, you might be missing having a timetable at hand for a quick reference while enjoying your trip? Then you might find this app useful. Here you will find the widest spread of ferry operators operating in the Adriatic sea. All the international routes to/from Croatia, including all the Croatian local ferry connections. More than 60 ferry routes with corresponding maps and timetables at your fingertips, along with branch offices/authorized agencies contact info of ticket sale/booking points. Port maps with ferry departure points, so you don't lose time finding your destinations address. Routes are searchable by regions of Croatian coast, defined by major coastal cities. If you're not familiar with Croatian places, an update is planned where you would be able to pick a route on a map. The app is 20 MB in size, due to the fact that all the graphics and other assets - maps and timetable PDF's, are stored in-app, offline. Once you install the app this content is cached to your device, so you don't have to worry about your service provider charging you any roaming fees. This is version 1.0 of the app, so go easy on me with the reviews. Updates will be planned as soon as ferry operators publish the changes on their websites. A cosmetic update of the app's look is also being considered. If you have any comments/bug reports/suggestions, please email me. Enjoy!

Pick from more than 90 built-in searches, enter a site and have Spiffy Search try to add it automatically, or enter a new search by hand. description: Made to Make Your Cycle Ride Easy Perhaps you are looking for a leisurely ride and would like to know exactly where you will end up, or maybe you need to know the quickest route to get you to your destination. We are there for you! Cycle Maps displays all of the bicycle routes in a selected area. We collect information of bike maps, bike lanes, and bike trails to get you where you are going, quickly and efficiently. It is an extremely comprehensive app that allows you to search bike routes in your area, or where you are going to be visiting so that you are prepared. Not only that, but Cycle Maps also provides a valuable GPS tracking and compass orientation that will keep you from getting lost. Speed down the bike trail without worrying about getting lost, because you know that we have you covered. Cycle Maps is a part of the Open Cycle Map, which is an open source project that allows for regular updates. You can Ride you Bike and the App will record and save the GPS data. You can now record your Tracks and download them as GPX or KML. Check out the Share option, it will lead you to our website with full track details. Cycle now records your Tracks and share them with the community. Creating Cycle Tracks database, together.

Vytáčejí Vás telemarketingové agentury? Už jste někdy naletěli dotěrným prodejcům po telefonu? Snad každý majitel mobilního telefonu to zná. Zazvoní telefon a na druhém konci se ozve hlas pracovníka marketingové agentury se „skvělou nabídkou“ bankovních služeb, zaručeně levnějších energií, či jiných nepotřebných věcí. Případně s dotazem, zda máte pár minut na průzkum trhu, který však nakonec po dlouhých minutách hovoru vyústí stejně v hon na Vaši peněženku. Někdo chce být slušný a pracovníka na druhém konci alespoň vyslechne, někdo okamžitě pokládá. Asi se shodneme na tom, že podobné nevyžádané hovory většinou obtěžují, vyrušují a kradou Vám volný čas. Aplikace Nevolejte.cz nabízí řešení, jak daným nevyžádaným hovorům zabránit. Jednoduše řečeno, aplikace Nevolejte.cz je call blocker s komunitně budovanou databází čísel prodejců po telefonu, které uživatelé aplikace navzájem sdílí. Pokud je prodejce identifikován alespoň dvěma důvěryhodnými uživateli aplikace, je jeho číslo zablokováno u všech ostatních uživatelů a už se jim nedovolá. Kromě sdílené černé listiny čísel aplikace umí blokovat i individuální hovory od otravných lidí, s kterými si nepřejete hovořit. Aplikace byla záměrně navržena pouze s omezeným počtem nutných funkcí z důvodu, aby ji bylo jednoduché ovládat, a také aby nezpomalovala přítomností zbytečných funkcí rychlost běhu mobilního telefonu a nevybíjela zbytečně baterii. Klíčové vlastnosti aplikace jsou: - Blokování telefonních čísel ručně zadaných uživatelem - Blokování telefonních čísel převzatých z historie volání - Blokování telefonních čísel převzatých z kontaktů uložených v telefonu nebo na SIM kartě - Blokování hovorů na základně komunitně budované černé listiny telefonních čísel - Volitelně blokování hovoru ze skrytých telefonních čísel - Aplikace zobrazuje plnou historii blokovaných hovorů, tak aby uživatel měl přehled kdy a proč byl hovor odmítnut. - Aplikace informuje o zablokovaném hovoru uživatele systémovou notifikací, bez nutnosti sebe sama spouštět. - Aplikace umožňuje lokálně odblokovat telefonní číslo, které blokuje černá listina čísel. (pomocí podržení prstu na záznamu v historii blokovaných hovorů) - Automatický zápis do Registru Nevolejte.cz, kterým majitel telefonu zveřejňuje nesouhlas s marketingovými kontakty po telefonu. - Aplikace umožňuje plnou funkčnost bez internetového připojení. Internetové připojení je nutné pouze během ruční aktualizace černé listiny čísel. - Aplikace upozorňuje uživatele, pokud je lokální kopie černé listiny čísel zastaralá a je nutná její aktualizace. - Plná podpora dual SIM telefonů Prémiové funkce, které je možné získat dočasně zdarma ( více na www.nevolejte.cz/bonus ), jsou: - Automatická aktualizace černé listiny na pozadí bez nutnosti spouštět aplikaci - Prioritní verze černé listiny (běžní uživatelé dostávají aktuální podobu o den později) - Blokování všech telefonních čísel, které nemám uložené v kontaktech (vhodné pro dětské majitele mobilních telefonů) - Blokování příchozích SMS na základě černé listiny (na verzi androidu KitKat a vyšší aplikace pouze upozorňuje na přítomnost na černé listině, ale neblokuje, protože tato verze androidu blokaci neumožňuje ) - Možnost volitelně zapnout si blokování hovorů pouze mimopracovní hodiny (noci a víkendy) Spojme se společně v boji proti nevyžádaným telefonním hovorům! Pomozte budovat černou listinu prodejců po telefonu a zablokujme prodejce na svých mobilních telefonech jednou provždy. Pokud narazíte v aplikaci na nějaký problém případně Vám chybí nějaká užitečná funkce, neváhejte nás kontaktovat na mailu info@nevolejte.cz . Děkujeme. Craze you telemarketing agency? Have you ever been duped intrusive dealers over the phone? Perhaps every mobile phone owner knows it. The phone rings and on the other end will hear the voice of employee marketing agency with "great deals" banking services, guaranteed to cheaper energy, or other unnecessary things. Alternatively, asking if you have a few minutes to survey the market, which finally, after long minutes of conversation will result in the same hunt on your wallet. Someone wants to be a good worker on the other end at least hear someone immediately considered. Perhaps we can agree that such unsolicited calls usually annoy, disturb you and steal leisure. Application Nevolejte.cz offers a solution to a given prevent unsolicited calls. Simply put, the application is Nevolejte.cz call blocker with community-building a database of phone numbers of dealers that users share applications with each other. If the seller is identified by at least two trustees applications, the number is blocked for all other users and you will not let them. In addition to a shared blacklist application numbers can also block individual calls from annoying people with whom you do not talk. Application has been deliberately designed with a limited number of functions necessary for the reason that it was easy to control, and also to the presence of unnecessary features does not slow down the running speed of the mobile phone and the vehicle's battery unnecessarily. Key features of the application are: - Prevent phone numbers manually entered by the user - Blocking numbers taken from the call history - Blocking numbers taken from the contacts stored on your phone or SIM card - Prevent calls to essential community built blacklist phone numbers - Optional blocking calls from hidden numbers - The application displays the full history of blocked calls, so that the user have an overview of when and why the call was rejected. - The application informs the user about the blocked call system notifications without having to run itself. - The application allows locally unblock a phone number that is blocking blacklist numbers. (By holding down your finger on the record in the history of blocked calls) - Automatic enrollment in the Register Nevolejte.cz which phone owner publishes disagreement with marketing contacts over the phone. - The application allows full functionality without an Internet connection. Internet connection is only necessary during manual update blacklist numbers. - The application notifies the user if the local copy of the blacklist numbers outdated and it needs to be updated. - Full support for dual SIM phones Premium features, which can be obtained free of charge temporarily (more on www.nevolejte.cz/bonus) are: - Update the blacklist in the background without having to run the application - Priority version blacklist (ordinary users receive current appearance a day later) - Blocking of phone numbers that I have stored in your contacts (suitable for children of mobile phone owners) - Block incoming SMS based on blacklists (for Android version KitKat and higher application only draws attention to the presence on the blacklist, but not block, because this version of Android does not allow blocking) - Ability to optionally turn on a barring only non-work hours (nights and weekends) Let us join together in the fight against unsolicited phone calls! Help build a blacklist of vendors on the phone and lock vendor on their mobile phones once and for all. If you come in on a problem or we are missing some useful features, do not hesitate to contact us on e-mail info@nevolejte.cz . Thank you.

Změny v PREMIUM verzi - nová funkce blokující všechny hovory z čísel, které nejsou uložené v kontaktech (vhodné pro dětské uživatele telefonů) - nově blokujeme také SMS zprávy - umíme zapnout blokování hovorů pouze mimo pracovní dobu (noci, víkendy)

*** NEW *** Use the Google Leaderboards to compare your performances with those of other players. BrainCise - Mental Arithmetic offers you the possibility to train mental arithmetic specifically and completely free of ads. In the current version the following training modes are available: + Sixty Seconds Solve as much problems of one type as possible within 60 seconds. As problem types there are addition, subtraction, multiplication, division, square a number and root extraction in up to seven difficulty levels selectable. Additionally, a personal ranking offers you an overview over your best results and keeps you motivated to improve yourself steadily. + Survive Receive time credits by solving problems to extend the duration of a game from 20 seconds to a maximum. Each wrong answer is imposed with a time penalty. The complexity of the problems increases with the duration of the game. There are three difficulty levels selectable which have an impact on the height of the given time credits. + Free Practise: Train addition, subtraction, multiplication, division, basic arithmetic operations, square a number, root extraction and decimal calculations as you want to and in up to seven difficulty levels. Because of diverse mathematical problem type and difficulty selection, BrainCise - Mental Arithmetic is suitable for every age group as well as skill level. Languages: English, German [calculate, maths, mathematics, mental arithmetic, mental math]

description: You can access the timetable information system of the VRS transportation companies using this app, including current data (on time, delayed) - if available. We set a high value on an user interface that is easy to use in order to provide a companion for everyday life. Some highlights of this app: • Uses your current location • Routing from address to address • Show way on foot using Google Maps • Interactive linemap • Favorite connections, addresses and stops • Buy tickets SEARCH: Display your route - whereever you are - without knowing which is the next stop. The app shows you the correct destination stop and also provides the way on foot using Google Maps. NOW: If you need a overview of stops around you, "Now" is the right choice. You can see the stops around you and the next departures from there. Once again on a map. INTERACTIVE LINEMAP: This is a real highlight. It shows the complete line network of the region clearly arranged and can be operated interactively. You can choose a stop and display its stop timetable, show it on a map, add it to your favorites or define it as origin or destination of a search. FAVORITES: Besides your own "Take me home" connection you can store other connections on your mobile. The app allows you to store connection favorites, addresses and stops using personalized names. TICKETS: Only one registration on https://www.handyticket.de/portals/web/nutzer/kvb/login.html and you can buy tickets in the App THE VRS NETWORK AREA: The VRS is a confederation of the cities Cologne, Bonn, Leverkusen and Monheim as well as the rural districts Rhein-Erft-Kreis, Rhein-Sieg-Kreis, Rheinisch-Bergischer Kreis, Oberbergischer Kreis and Kreis Euskirchen. THE VRS TRANSPORTATION COMPANIES: - Bahnen der Stadt Monheim (BSM) - Busverkehr Rheinland (BVR) - DB Regio NRW - Dürener Kreisbahn (DKB) - Hellertalbahn (HTB) - Verkehrsbetrieb Hüttebräucker (VBH) - Karl Schäfer Reisen - Kölner Verkehrs-Betriebe (KVB) - Kraftverkehr Gebr. Wiedenhoff (KGW) - Kraftverkehr Wupper-Sieg (KWS) - Martin Becker (MB) - Oberbergische Verkehrsgesellschaft (OVAG) - Regionalverkehr Euregio Maas-Rhein (RVE) - Regionalverkehr Köln (RVK) - Rhein-Erft-Verkehrsgesellschaft (REVG) - Rhein-Sieg-Verkehrsgesellschaft (RSVG) - StadtBus Dormagen (SDG) - Stadtverkehr Euskirchen (SVE) - Stadtwerke Bonn (SWBV) - Stadtwerke Brühl (STwB) - Stadtwerke Hürth (SVH) - Stadtwerke Wesseling (SWW) - Tirtey Reisen (ti) - trans regio Deutsche Regionalbahn (TR) - Veolia Transdev Mittelrhein - Verkehrsgesellschaft Bergisches Land (VBL) - Westerwaldbahn

You can now play the next evolution of the classical match-3 games! This is an incredibly original puzzle game for Android and iOS / iPhone! The universe, in its primordial state, needs your help to spread elements in all worlds to bring life to everything. description: This program is designed for those who want to learn interesting mathematical tricks to speed up the calculating. These tricks will help solve part of the mathematical problems and tasks much faster than classical. Will also be helpful to those who want to hone basics such as the multiplication table. When you learn these mathematical tricks, you'll be able to show off your skills to friends and prove to them that you have a talent for mathematics. New skills you can use in the store, at school, at college, at work - wherever thanks to quick calculation skills can save a lot of precious time. Fun Math Tricks: 1. Addition 2. Subtraction 3. Multiplication table 4. Division 5. Multiply two digit number by 11 6. Square numbers ending in 5 7. Multiply by 5 8. Multiply by 9 9. Multiply by 4 10. Dividing by 5 11. Subtracting from 1000 12. Tough multiplication 13. Power of two 14. Adding numbers close to hundreds 15. Subtracting numbers close to hundreds 16. Multiply numbers between 11 and 19 17. Square numbers between 11 and 99 18. Multiply two digit numbers having same tens digit and ones digits add up to ten 19. Square numbers between 50 and 59 20. Square numbers between 40 and 49 21. Multiply two digit numbers editing in 1 22. Percent 23. Square numbers between 100 and 109 Training mode: - 15 levels for every trick - timer 15 seconds Rating stars: - score > 000 - ★☆☆ - score > 350 - ★★☆ - score > 650 - ★★★ This free version of Math Tricks contains third party advertisements.

description: A 3D rendered live wallpaper background of a fish tank, with beautiful backgrounds and smooth motion. Double-tap to feed them! Triggerfish, clownfish, turtles, seahorses, jellyfish, lionfish, and more! Works as a daydream on 4.2+ devices! Customize up to 14 simultaneous fish, change plants, change backgrounds, select tank decorations, toggle the overhead light & bubbler! Use your own custom backgrounds, too! Not a movie, our wallpapers take full advantage of OpenGL, and support both home screen scrolling and landscape/portrait modes! TO USE: Home->Long Press->Live Wallpapers PERMISSIONS: External Storage needed for custom image support.

description: Soar through the clouds with this beautiful 3D live wallpaper! Colorful balloons drift through the scene, randomly or based on your unread messages! See the sun rise and set, and the moon with appropriate phases! Lots of settings for cloud density, wind speed, sun and moon elevation, scene coloration, lighting based on time of day, and more! Not a movie! Makes full use of OpenGL, with support for landscape viewing and home screen movement! Works as a daydream on 4.2+ devices! TO USE: Home->Long Press->Live Wallpapers PERMISSIONS: SMS: Used to read how many unread messages you have, and spawn balloons based on that. Coarse Location: Used to calculate accurate sunrise/sunset times for your current location.
release_text: v2.26: - Support for more languages! - Adjusted moon position and fade-in - Updated icon artwork

description: Watch Koi happily explore their pond! Colorful fish and beautiful backgrounds make Koi Live Wallpaper better than the real thing! Select from 20 different Koi types! Koi Live Wallpaper is 3D rendered in OpenGL 2.0, with fully interactive water that supports multitouch. Both tablets and phones are fully supported in both portrait and landscape modes, and Daydreams are supported on 4.2+ devices! Double-tap to feed your fish! Tap a fish to startle it! This full version has access to the settings screen, with controls for your fish population, background image, raindrops, time of day, and more. Add lily pads to the water surface, or provide your own custom background! TO USE: home->long press->wallpapers

description: Snowfall is a beautiful live wallpaper featuring gentle snowflakes falling overtop swaying pine trees. Not a movie, with full support for landscape mode and home screen switching on any sized screen! Tilt your device to influence snow direction! Works as a daydream on 4.2+ devices! This full version has tons of settings for colors, Christmas lights, time of day tracking, camera speeds, Santa sightings, snow appearance, and more! PERMISSIONS: Coarse location is to allow calculation of accurate sunrise/sunset times! TO USE: Home->Long Press->Wallpapers

description: A stunning live wallpaper featuring a spinning spiral galaxy, Galactic Core is a beautiful and serene backdrop for your home screen, with many layers of depth apparent when switching home screens. Rendered in OpenGL, this wallpaper fully supports both portrait and landscape modes, works on phones and tablets, and is a fully functional Daydream on 4.2+ devices! This full version has lots of settings available, including alternate visual themes, color tinting, rotation speed and direction, touch sensitivity, camera motion, framerate unlocking, and more! TO USE: Home->Long Press->Live Wallpapers
release_text: v2.41: - Fixed crash upon theme change in some locales. Sorry! - Minor localization adjustments

description: A spectacular live wallpaper of storm clouds and lightning, Thunderstorm uses OpenGL to render a constantly moving scene of clouds. Works as a Daydream on 4.2+ devices! Fully supports both landscape and portrait, on either a phone or tablet! This paid version has a full settings screen, so you can customize ambient light color, bolt color, wind speed, bolt frequency, number of clouds, and more! Enable colors to change by time of day, or go retro with minimalist mode! Tap your screen to summon lightning! TO USE: Home->Long Press->Wallpapers PERMISSIONS: - Coarse Location allows calculation of reasonable sunrise/sunset times for your current location
