▣ 자전거 등록/조회 서비스 – 바이크서치 ▣ 사진 찍고, 차대번호만 입력하면 끝! 스마트한 자전거 등록/조회 서비스! 바이크서치(BikeSearch)는 자전거를 등록하고, 조회하고, 도난/분실 신고하는 서비스입니다. (★ 2013 LBS 활용 앱&웹 공모전 방송통신위원회위원장상 수상) [자전거 등록 서비스] - 구입과 함께 찾아오는 자전거 도난/분실의 공포 - 사진 찍고, 차대번호만 입력하면 내 자전거 등록 끝! - 없어진 내 자전거, 불법 유통되는 건 용납 못 해! - 중고 자전거 팔 때도, 안전하게 등록된 자전거니까 OK [자전거 조회 서비스] - 중고 자전거 사고 팔 때, 묻지마 거래는 이제 그만! - 차대번호만 입력하면 자전거 정보와 소유자 정보가 한 번에! - 사고 싶은데, 도난 자전거면 어쩌지? 조회 한 번이면, 걱정 끝! [도난/분실 신고 서비스] - 자전거가 없어진 현장에서 바로, 실시간 도난/분실 신고! - 도난/분실 위치 찍고 시간 입력하면, 바로 도난 자전거 지도에 업데이트! - 현상금 추가 기능으로 내 자전거 빠르게 찾기 시도 - 댓글 제보로 하나되는 우리 동네 자전거 지킴이 서비스 [NFC 태그 서비스] - 특수 제작된 바이크서치 NFC 태그를 자전거에 부착 - 등록된 내 자전거 정보를 바이크서치 NFC 태그에 저장 - 스마트폰만 접촉(NFC 기능 ON)하면 손쉽게 등록 정보 조회 - 중고 자전거 거래 시, 도난/분실 의심 자전거 발견 시 접촉만 하면 뙇! (등록방법 보기) http://youtu.be/fcUAat8QSHc (조회방법 보기) http://youtu.be/OOaWj20nm9o ※ 응? 차대번호가 뭔가요? - 차대번호는 자전거 프레임에 새겨진 고유의 번호로 영어와 숫자 조합으로 이루어져 있습니다. By 9LAB [바이크서치 웹사이트] www.bikesearch.co.kr [바이크서치 페이스북] https://www.facebook.com/bikesearch 추천 TAG ] ------------------------- 바이크서치, bikesearch, 자전거, 자전거등록제, 자전거조회, 차대번호, 도난, 신고, NFC, 태그, 바이크, bike, bicycle, 4대강, 노원구자전거, Tranggle, 트랭글, 에코마일리지, GPS, 속도계, 행복나눔, 두바퀴, mtb, 국토종주, 삼천리, 바이크앤 ---- 개발자 연락처 : info@9lab.kr

With the official FC Red Bull Salzburg App powered by A1 you can receive all the info on the Red Bulls straight on your iPhone! Latest news, videos, fixtures, live match updates, press conferences and the training schedule for the boys are now on hand for you. Plus with user-defined push notifications you will be updated with news and developments as they happen. Should you wish, you can change the language in the settings to read all content in German. CONTENTS - LIVE (Ticker incl. live updates, statistics & line-up) - Real-time PUSH NOTIFICATIONS (Topics: matches, offers, news) - Latest FC Red Bull Salzburg NEWS - VIDEOS incl. live streams of our press conferences - TEAMS (Overview of squads) - SEASON (Fixtures, table, training schedule) - CALENDAR (Save all the fixtures in your calendar with an iCal file) - TICKETS (Match ticket info, online shop) - RED BULL ARENA (Stadium, arrival, tours) - SOCIAL MEDIA (All channels at a glance)

Do you have old tablet? Or do you want to make your lovely device to show time and weather forecast when it on charging? This application for you! Nowadays wall clock are quite stupid, but price for them is a little bit less that price for tablet PC. And weather station is expensive. So, why do you need to buy stupid clock or expensive weather station when you can take this application and the cheapest table pc or old useless one and get smart clock: - they wouldn't lost time during blackouts. And it even doesn't require batteries for that, because device already has rechargeable battery - screen brightness is auto adjustable. Even if your device has not light sensor - application use camera as light sensor (disabled in settings by default) - you can choose one of 16 million color for displaying - alarm clock from Android OS - displaying current date, sunset and sunrise - weather now, forecast for one day each 6 hour and forecast on next week: temperature, wind speed and direction, pressure, clouds, precipitation and if sky is clear - moon phase, Units for temperature, speed and pressure are adjustable. - automatic start and close application on plugged/unplugged charger ( disabled in settings by default ) - and even do not have to set up time on this clock, because Android OS could take time from network and you will have exact time! You can use this application for your lovely device like screen saver while charging. Especially for devices with dock stations. Just turn on autorun and autoclose feature in settings and clock will appear while device is docking. Tips: On first launch choose your city for weather forecast. If your device have navigation bar, it will be hidden on application start. Any touch return navigation bar to screen, is not affecting on application. Touch the alarm clock icon to show system alarm clock. Touch the time to show application menu (the same as menu button, in case if your device does not have menu button). Touch the weather to switch two types of forecast - dayly and weekly. If your device does not has a light sensor, but it has camera, better front, turn on brightness adjusting using camera in settings - it will measure light every 30 seconds. But if you run this on unplugged device it will decrease on-battery time. Time and date format are taken from system. If you need brightness lower that your device allows, change in settings -> text color value R, G, B to lower ones. For example: if you change green (#00FF00) to 80 instead of FF, brightness will twice lower. You can choose screen rotation in settings. Weather provided by OpenWeatherMap - http://openweathermap.org All weather data are provided under the CC-BY-SA 2.0 license - http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0
release_text: v1.2 weather forecast now keeps in device memory, so app could show forecast even without internet screen rotation, portrait mode navigation bar remover improved date text over-filling fixed minor bugs+cosmetic fixes v1.1 android 4.4 KitKat support 2560x1600 devices support improved auto brightness adjustment using camera icons brightness now is depend on text brightness minor bugs fixes

description: This application is a useful tool to help you improve your English. We hope this application will prove to be a useful tool to help improve your English reading and listening skills. It is a collection of free English text and audio files we have gathered from the internet. We have put them together in one convenient place for easy access. The application connects you directly to our private server and allows you to download the files straight to your phone. The files are saved in the folder /sdcard/ListenEnglish. The first time you run the program you will see a message saying, “The English texts and audio files don’t exist on your phone. Would you like to download?” Choose ‘Accept’ to confirm. You will then be able to choose which files you would like to download. If you find that you cannot access the files after downloading them, simply navigate to the folder, delete the files, and re-download them. The more you download the more storage space it will occupy on your phone or sd card. Data charges may occur according to your data plan. The more data is used the more you may be charged. Wi-fi connections normally do not use the 3G network, so data rates do not apply. We will be updating our server from time to time adding more English text and audio files for you to enjoy. Updated lists will be automatically applied and available for viewing. *keyword Audio Book/English Listening/Study English/LC/Free Listening/Read Book/Read English/English Book/
release_text: v1.2 # The first run-time error correction. v1.1 # download problem fixed.

description: Lynkee turns your camera phone into a QR and product barcode scanner. Lynkee is regularly ranked as top performer in this category for its features, ergonomics and quick scanning. Lynkee 2 offers you a whole bunch of interesting new features and improvement: Optional and dedicated internal browser, Facebook and Twitter login, QR Generator, product search engine, keytags, Led Flash, faster scanning, history, price and satisfaction comparator …just download and enjoy it ! You can scan a QR code, Datamatrix and consumer product barcodes (EAN/UPC) in real-time and for a multitude of 2D code type: URL, Geo-location, Product, VCard, Mecard, SMS, Phone Number, Authentication, Text, Mail, Bookmarks… You may create your URL, text or contact QR codes with easy ; also you may generate for free your own QR codes on www.qreasy.com Lynkee more social ! …Edit your own Lynkee profile on your mobile or on www.lynkee.com: * Share your scan * Follow-up your activities (scans, bookmarks ...) on your laptop/tablet on www.lynkee.com * Share your generated QR codes * Add and share your product reviews Enter in the lynkee network !

Sudoku - Puzzle, develop your memory and thinking. If you've been in a book store in the last six months - or an airport, waiting room or college lecture class - you've probably seen someone staring at a sudoku. Given its popularity, one might think it's some new type of porn. But no, it's just a puzzle. It's a widespread, logic-based fad of a puzzle that is simple enough to suck you in and difficult enough to keep you hooked. In this article, we'll find out what a sudoku puzzle entails, how to go about solving one and where the concept originated (hint: It's not Japan. Let's get started. Sudoku is a game of numbers - specifically, the numbers 1 through 9 - but it really isn't about math. It's about logic. Instead of 1 through 9, you could use the first nine letters of the alphabet or a set of nine symbols, and it would be the same game. The basis of sudoku is a nine-by-nine grid. You've got three sections to think about: rows, columns and boxes. The goal of sudoku is to fill each nine-square row, each nine-square column and each nine-square box with the numbers 1 through 9, with each number used once and only once in each section. It's the interaction between the rows, columns and boxes that tells you where the numbers need to go. So if you were to start with a blank grid and fill in the numbers for row 1, column 2 and box 4 according to the sudoku rules. Of course, starting with a blank grid wouldn't make it much of a challenge. A sudoku puzzle already has some of the numbers filled in, and it's your job to figure out where the rest of the numbers go. Differences from the free version: - More games. - No advertising. Options: - 3 seasons with 150 games. 5 levels of difficulty. - Very comfortable dynamic keyboard to quickly select the correct number. - Rating game users with display of the country. - Displays the number of entering and remaining digits. - Painting numbers on the keypad at its full entry into the game (9 digits). - Add notes and more.
release_text: - New season games (150 games). - Fixed some bugs.

description: Find pairs and collect magical gems through multiple levels of raising difficulty in this unique game inspired by mahjong solitaire. Features: * Multiple levels, * Minigames (Memory and Rivers), * Hand drawn fantasy graphics, * Lives, * Zoom in and out, * Gems, * Dynamic fantasy music, * Challenging game play - beat the time bar! Turn off shadows on slower phones.
release_text: 1.50 15 new levels No need to unlock levels anymore Bug fixes

description: Forty Thieves is a challenging solitaire requiring some skill and patience. On easy level you can go through the stock three times which makes it much easier though. On hard level cards on the tableu that are not on top are hidden. The game is more suited for tablets and large phones because there is a lot of cards on screen - on small screen phones you might have problems navigating (480x320 is absolute minimum resolution). Rules - click on the left stack to get new card, - move all cards to foundations - from Ace to King, - you can place a card on another card if it's higher and is the same suit or put it on an empty space, - you can move only one card at a time Features - high resolution - undo - saving state - clean cards - zoom Check also our other solitaires!

The most popular solitaire in the world - Klondike Solitaire also known as Patience - with clear graphics perfect for phones and tablets of every screen size. Rules - move cards from A to K to foundations, - build piles down by altering colors (8 diamond on 9 cross), - in hard difficulety you can pass the deck only three time, Tips how to win - try not to move cards from top deck (waste) to your piles unless you really need them, - move cards to foundations (A to K on the top right) quickly, - use undo to solve harder cases. Features - autosave, you don't need to worry when a phone calls interupting your game, - three difficulty levels: draw 1 Klondike Solitaire (easy), draw 3 Klondike Solitaire (medium and hard) - score, - undo, - easy moving of cards (you can move whole pile even if you need to only move one card!), - smooth animations, - double click to move cards to foundation, - high resolution for ICS tablets and phones, - zoom In this release some things are not yet ready - but expect them soon: - music, - image backgrounds (right now you can only change colour), - additional card deck (like in Spider Solitaire HD). From the makers of Spider Solitaire HD.

Engaging puzzle platformer with adventure and arcade elements. Lead a wizardess, a troll and a knight on a journey home by jumping, collecting coins, solving puzzles, fighting monsters and interacting with funny creatures. Excellent 2D side-scroller for both casual and avid players in love with retro games with head-scratching puzzles and humorous dialogues voiced in a fun bable-talk. New levels coming soon. This is initial version, please report any problems.
release_text: 1.55 Fixes related to level 9 issues - thank for those who reported them! Polish translation 1.50 Blue episode with new levels

description: Classic Lines game - slide marbles to make lines of five. HD graphics makes it perfect for tablets and large phones. The game also has dynamite, stone marbles and question marks that make it more interesting and even more addictive! Try to get the best highscore!

Dynamic memory game with physics - for kids, little children and adults! Requires good memory and reflexes. Allows training memory in kids and provides lots of fun. With multiplayer mode! Features: ★ physics engine, ★ 28 Water levels ★ 28 Ice levels ★ 28 Earth levels ★ 28 Christmas levels ★ hot seat multiplayer ★ additional Classic levels similar to classic memory game ★ collect stars and try to beat your highscore, ★ three difficulty levels, ★ funny pictures and animated creatures that help or make matters worse, children will love it! ★ lives, ★ fun music, ★ multilayered levels, ★ fish and birds making things a little harder and a pigeon that saves drowning tiles for you, ★ dragon that eats the tile - you have to find the pair for it before the dragon spits it, ★ carnivorous plant that eats images ★ mole that throws tiles off the screen ★ quality setting allowing you to play even on older phones, ★ HD graphics looks astounding even on large Honeycomb tablets like Asus Transformer, Motorola Xoom or Galaxy Tab, Try your memory! The game uses physics engine and adds multiple hurdles and aids to spice up the classical game of finding pairs of pictures. It's suitable for all ages - even children as young as 4 will find it amusing (especially on easy difficulty setting). Find all pairs before they drown in the rising water or are pushed out of screen by fish. If you found a bug or it doesn't work on your device - please contact us, we'll fix it as fast as we can. If you comment about problems - please write what device do you use - so we can check and correct any bugs! The game uses libGDX and box2D libraries.
release_text: This game has no ads now. Enjoy!

To every real geek has already somebody advised to "Get a life". As a good geek you are, you must have tried googling to know the procedure to "buy a life". Unfortunately, no result: not even a chinese website of illegal lives importations. The ultimate question then arises but the answer is this time not 42: "How can you get a life?" For this reason, to fill this vital need of all the geeks of this planet, I elaborated the answer, the solution, to the ULTIMATE QUESTION. description: 本应由5个模块供小朋友选择: 1.【中文诵读】:中文逐句诵读,可暂停、上句、下句; 2.【英文诵读】:英文逐句诵读,可暂停、上句、下句; 3.【跟我唱歌】:对照文字逐句唱歌,可暂停、上句、下句; 4.【对照练习】:中、英对照,逐句讲解,并对重点词汇圈点解释,可暂停、上句、下句; 5.【看图认词】:对照图片,中、英对照,学习单词,可暂停、上个、下个。 功能特点: **双语教学:在学习童话故事的同时加强英文听,读水平。 **动画界面:全新动画设计,充满童趣。 **图片精美:鲜艳亮丽,手绘卡通风格,易于理解,便与记忆。 **互动练习:通过学单词,跟读,英文歌曲等互动环节,激发孩子的学习热情 **优美配乐:以优美的名曲为音乐背景,帮助孩子更好的领悟故事意境。 《多多学英语》系列共有40多个应用,专为孩子英语学习方面而设计,搜索"多多"下载更多应用。 妈妈在哪儿(Where is my mom),中英对照看童话,边看边学英语。适合4岁到12岁儿童。 一个温暖的春日,小鸡彼彼正在院子里玩....

Don't you just feel like jumping up and down when you receive the present you wished for, girls? Baby Barbie wanted a bicycle so badly and her parents surprised her with a girly pink Kitty bike the other day. Imagine how happy she is now! Hang out with Barbie on a fun bike ride. Help her clean up her new Kitty gadget first washing it with lots of soap bubbles and water. You can select a different color and body design, turning it into a lighter or darker pink and decorating it with flowers, strawberries, bunnies or cute teddy bears instead. Experience the baby girl's first bicycle accident and give her the first aid. This is what happens if you don't watch where you're going! She stumbled against a rock on the pavement and injured her head and arm. Disinfect the wounds with a sterilizing lotion and cotton pads. Remove the debris and apply bandages. Baby Barbie will be more careful next time she rides her fancy bike. How about some dress up suggestions for the little girl? What clothes, footwear and accessories should she wear for this awesome outdoor activity? Rummage in her fashionable closet and pick appropriate dresses, tops and bottoms. Add a pair of trendy sport shoes or flat sandals and sassy chic sunglasses to complete each outfit. Have a fabulous time playing our newest baby game!

Hello Cute Babies! Here comes our stylish Barbie doll with a major challenge for you: in only a few days from now she will be attending her prom and she’s thinking to give herself a major change for this event… one that involves scissors, styling tools and, of course, glam hair accessories! Ladies, Princess is looking for a brand-new haircut for her prom night and she can’t wait for you to start creating the one that is sure to leave all her senior colleagues mouth-opened! So, are you ready to show of your amazing hairstyling skills? Great! If so, get the Princess Prom Haircuts game started and first of all, prepare her gorgeous blonde hair-locks for the styling process by using the best shampoo on the market to wash it up and a delicate conditioner to give it a gloving of health look! Use the professional hair blower that you have at your disposal in this online hair game for girls to obtain a natural volume for her hair and then ladies. well, feel free to go to the net page of the game and start cutting her hair until you reach the desired length! Pick from a selection of three different hair styling tools the needed one to finish Princess's prom updo in style. Great jobs ladies! Now what about changing the color of her hair, too by adding some bits of sweet candy-pink, lovely lavender or maybe some bold green shades for a major transformation? Pick out your favorites and then look for a glam evening dress to dress Princess up for her prom! Don’t forget to also select a really nice hair accessory for a complete, jaw-dropping prom look! Enjoy playing this brand new Princess Game

description: Owning a car is a great responsibility and can be lots of fun, and with this Clean My New Beetle cleaning game you can easily take on the challenge of cleaning your new pink beetle so it is ready for the open road. Here you can easily take charge and place the rubbish in the rubbish bin, pick off all your personal items including hat, bags, sunglasses, and more, before easily scrubbing the pieces of dirt and grime from your cars exterior! Once you have finished tidying it up you can then complete you car's appearance by giving it a quick and easy wash over to bring out its beautiful pink colored body. So if you want to own your very own car, why not take charge now with this Clean My New Beetle cleaning game today. Features: • CLEAN up game fun! Remove all the rubbish and throw it in the rubbish bin! • PICK off any of your personal items to help clean your car to make it look tidy! • SCRUB the dirt patches from your beetle using the scrubbing brush! • CLEAN your new beetle by giving it a final wash down with clean water! • WATCH your clean car shine in the sunlight ready for driving! • ENJOY this beetle car cleaning game with your friends and family!

description: Learn to play guitar With JAMSTAR ACOUSTICS…an interactive guitar app that works with any GUITAR! Learn chords, scales, rhythm and songs from the biggest names in music. Want to learn to play songs on guitar by The Beatles, Green Day, Led Zeppelin, Foo Fighters, KISS, R.E.M. and more? Now you can with JAMSTAR! With Jamstar Acoustics your device HEARS YOU play and gives REAL TIME feedback. Over 100 courses are FREE, plus you’ll have unlimited access to Jamstar Acoustics’ intuitive guitar tuner that guides you string-by-string. "Accurate and easy to use...Those looking for an interactive approach to learning guitar should check it out." - Guitar World “Jamstar is a game changer!” – Tonefreqs.com "Jamstar makes learning guitar fun and easy. The combination of side scrolling TAB view with the colour coded strings creates the perfect learning environment." - GuitarNoize.com "A Cool Free App That Teaches You To Play The Guitar!" – Techcrunch "App of the Day! A Guitar Learning App That Won't Hold You Back" - Gizmodo “I wonder where'd I'd be if I had this app when I started playing guitar.” Thomas Ian Nicholas, Professional Musician, Actor - @TINBand “I've downloaded 1,000,000 guitar apps with no benefit at all. This one made a change in my music life...I can actually play now! Beware girls here I come ;) Thanks Jamstar!” - Benjamin112 Jamstar proudly features DR NEON™ MULTI-COLOR strings! There is a direct correlation between color and improved learning efficiency and we've developed the "COLOR-PLAY" system with DR as a result. Using DR NEON™ Multi-Color sets on your guitar and virtually in Jamstar, you will easily see which fret to hit on which string more quickly and accurately. Jamstar Acoustics is the most powerful guitar-teaching tool available today. No additional hardware is needed. You will never need to download another guitar learning application, ever!
release_text: v2.2.1 * Enhanced Accuracy: Your device will recognize the notes and chords you are playing even more precisely than before! * Faster Response Time: We've upgraded the platform so the feedback you get while playing guitar is practically instantaneous!

description: Google has pushed an update again to Google Maps that has broken the app. I hope to have a fix this weekend. Fishing Weather is a simple app used to determine if the weather forecast is good enough to go fishing based on your preferences. Set your preferred weather conditions for temperature, rain, wind and a fishing icon is displayed if the weather is within those parameters, a house icon is displayed otherwise. Features - New weather data provider with a more accurate weather forecast - Touch the daily weather forecast to get a detailed hourly weather forecast - Select a forecast start and end time to get the forecast for the hours you are actually awake - Redesigned use interface with scalable images that look much better - Scales beautifully on both small and large screens - Fast load time - Small size - English and metric weather data selected automatically based on your location - Location based on GPS, zip code, city/state or city/country (GPS is slow, entering a location is much faster) Powered by Forecast http://forecast.io Please email me with any issues or feature requests before giving the app a negative rating.
release_text: - Fixed loading issue when GPS is turned off or location not found

description: If you have ever wanted to be a princess and style your very own clothes then now you can with this Pretty Princess Makeover game! Here you can prepare your princess by washing and rinsing her skin, popping her annoying pimples, cleansing and moisturizing her face to make her skin soft and smooth, and plucking her eyebrows so they are neat and tidy. Once you have given her beautiful soft features you can then accessorize her lovely face by changing her eye shadow, lipstick, eye color, eyelashes, hair style, jewellery, and dress design! So if you love princesses and love to give makeovers then the pretty princess makeover game is just right for you. description: EGG DEFENDER: an evolution based tower defense game! You play as the brood mother of a rapidly expanding nest of ravenous creatures. Lay and hatch eggs to defend your nest. It is your duty to both protect your eggs and feed your young! Eradicate the indigenous slime population by devouring their biomass. Use it to evolve your children into larger, deadlier weapons of destruction. Unlike other tower defense games, EGG DEFENDER involves the creative and more complex side of manipulating the invading monsters path by carefully crafting a maze of eggs and creatures. -Set deadly labyrinths by building the path that enemies must take. -Tap to strike from below as the Brood Mother. ＼(￣(エ)￣ ＼) ＼(￣(エ)￣)／ (／ ￣(エ)￣)／ //FEATURES\\ 28 Towers! 5 Enemies! description: "Fiete" is a beautifully illustrated, interactive picture book for children between 1 to 3 years. There are important tasks waiting for the children: sandwiches must be buttered, tires mounted and ships loaded. FEATURED: Featured in AppsGoneFree. Your daily free app resource. Featured by iMums, appgefahren, Pappas Appar, Appymall, ... OUR MISSION: This app was developed by us for our own children. "Fiete" has completely omitted advertising, in-app purchases and there are no links from the game to the internet. We want parents to feel at ease when your children are playing with our app. ABOUT FIETE: We see "Fiete" as an alternative to the interactive children's book: In a playful way, with attention to detail and design competence is the motor skills and the ability to combine the small encouraged. The game does not have any written instructions, making it suitable for children of all ages. Together with their parents, children learn to help "Fiete" in his everyday life. A total of fifteen tasks is waiting to be discovered by them. Sounds and animations are used to encourage and motivate the little ones. HIGHLIGHTS: ***** Developed by parents for their own children ***** ***** Completely ad-free ***** ***** No in-app purchases ***** OTHER HIGHLIGHTS: - Unique game design - 2D illustrations and animations, (hand-drawn) - 16 interactive scenes - 3 memo-games - Atmospheric soundscapes - Intuitive FEEDBACK FROM PARENTS: "Fiete is the best! I don't dare give it to the children, in case I don't get the iPad back." "What I like most about the app, apart from the most beautiful drawings, is that the app is so unobtrusive." description: Let´s start from 1 december 2014. Together with Fiete you are waiting for christmas eve. Till then you unwrap a little present every day. When children wait for christmas together with Fiete, unwrap a little present every day, play and decorate, the time until christmas eve is passing much faster. With the help of this lovely and very atmospheric app children spend the Advent season with sailor Fiete visiting him in his apartment every day. And every day there is a nice little surprise. So waiting for Santa Claus is not that difficult anymore. And what may Fiete get as his Christmas present? – Hush, we do not want to give away yet. All advent presents can be combined freely to allow a maximum of creativity. To build something from the toy blocks or have the little toy car jump over a bridge is just as much fun as deciding how to decorate Fiete’s apartment. This wonderful interactive advent calendar app is a little pre-Christmas present for all Fiete fans. Just download for free and look forward to the 1st of December. HIGHLIGHTS • Rejoice each day over a new advent surprise • Get creative – play around freely • Look at how Fiete´s house gets ready for christmas • Lovingly designed and painted • Intuitive controls You like Fiete? This app help kids practice in a fun and rewarding way. They will look forward to practice and you will watch them learn new things. Includes time tested activities to develop maths and language skills. Maths activities include –Addition Subtract Drills in various forms, Times Tables, Fractions and Telling Time. Synonyms – Antonyms and Sight words will help increase the vocabulary of child. Spellings activity is also included to complete language skills. Activities include applying concept of addition and subtraction and apply multiple number concepts at a time. 1.Missing Numbers – Find the missing numbers. Like 10-?=4 4+?=6 2.Balance the Apples – Child can calculate using fingers 6+5=11. But ask in a different manner – Which two numbers make 11. Here the child will solve problems like these. 3.Even Odd Numbers – This activity helps the child in applying more than one concept. The child has to find even/odd numbers greater than or less than a given number. Finding only even / odd numbers or greater than/less than numbers may not be a challenge but when asked together it becomes. 4.Combinations of Tens ( 10,20,30,40…)- Activity to make the child comfortable with these numbers. 5.Times tables – Child can practise tables from 1-12. and many more

Our activities and games are designed keeping in mind 1st graders' abilities, level of skill and curriculum. We have easy-to-use navigation buttons and voice instructions.They will help homeschooling your child. These activities help them learn new words and practice letter-sound relationships and are effective tools when it comes to teaching different maths concepts important at this stage – Addition, Subtractions, Patterns and Ordering Numbers. Apart from this kids can also be creative keep themselves engaged with other fun games like drawing, coloring, joining dots, mazes and memory match. Addition And subtraction are taught in a very interactive way using all the tools – figures, sticks and numberline. A teacher is also there to assist them. Overview- a. Addition and Subtraction with help from numberline, finger counting, and a teacher to help with b. Phonics Long Vowels words. c. Phonics Blends and Digraphs Words d. Exhaustive Spelling List e. Patterns f. Ascending and descending order g. Drawing and Painting h. Colouring the pictures i. Amazing Mazes j. Join the dots to find hidden pictures k. Memory Match l. Nouns and Verbs m. Compound Words

Give your children a head start by teaching them phonics at an early age! Phonics Match is designed to help young children blend and segment words by learning the 42 sounds of the English language, rather than the alphabet. By combining matching pairs with phonics, Phonics Match improves your child's cognitive skills in a fun and playful way. Features: - 42 different cards with their own letter/word - Fully voiced with correct phonics pronunciation - Colourful graphics with support for most resolutions - Collect stickers after completing a game - Uses the Jolly Phonics system (widely used in UK primary schools) - No ads that your child(ren) could tap on - No in-app purchases or unlocks, full features available Phonics Match includes a wide selection of colourful cards and children can match pairs within specific phonics groups or can play a fully random game of matching pairs.
release_text: ADDED NEW LANGUAGES Choose between British English, American English and Australian English.

description: Phonics Puzzles is designed to help children understand the different phonetic sounds, rather than the alphabet. By completing phonics puzzles and practising the different phonics groups, Phonics Puzzles improves your child's cognitive skills in a fun and playful way. The app is divided into the different jolly phonics groups and includes a wide selection of colourful puzzles and children can complete puzzles within specific phonics groups or can play a randomised endless game of puzzles. Features: - Over 180 different puzzles! - Includes 3 languages! British English, American English and Australian English. - Uses the Jolly Phonics system (widely used in UK primary schools). - Includes randomised quick play mode and specific phonics groups play. - Fully voiced with correct phonics pronunciation (friendly professional voice). - Change between lower and uppercase letters. - Colourful graphics with support for many phone/tablet resolutions. - Parental gate prevents your children to go out of the app. - Full features available, no in-app purchases!

ORD MEMORY ingår i serien Lära Läsa Åk1 från JMAppar och är tänkt som komplement, stöd och omväxling till den vanliga läxan. Appen följer de riktlinjer och rekommendationer som finns i Skolverkets Lgr11 angående kunskapsmål för lågstadiet. Steg två i att lära sig läsa är att få "flyt" i läsande. Detta får man genom att man kommer ihåg mellanord och vanligt förekommande ord i "bildminnet", så att man inte behöver läsa ordet, utan direkt ser vad som står i texten. Appen är ett klassiskt memoryspel där man skall hitta det matchande ordet bakom brickorna. När man hittat det matchande ordet så försvinner brickorna, och man har hittat en pusselbit som sen blir till en hel bild. Varje gång man vänder en bricka så säger en röst vad som står på brickan. Detta för att förstärka lärandeprocessen med både bild och ljud. Appen innehåller även de mest förekommande orden i mattetal, som förberedelse inför matematik i Årskurs två. Appen innehåller de 200 vanligaste orden i Svenska språket. WORDS MEMORY included in the series Learning Reading AK1 from JMAppar and is meant to complement, support and variety to the usual homework. The app follows the guidelines and recommendations set out in the Agency Lgr11 regarding learning outcomes for primary school. Step two in learning to read is to "float" in reading. This is achieved by one remembers betwee the North and frequently used words in "Picture Memory" so that you do not need to read the word, without directly seeing what is in the text. The app is a classic memory game in which you must find the matching word behind the tiles. When you have found the matching word will disappear washers, and they have found a piece of the puzzle which then turns into a full image. Every time you turn a tray so says a voice what is on the tray. This is to enhance the learning process with both picture and sound. The app also contains the most frequently used words in math problems, in preparation for mathematics in Grade two. The app contains the 200 most common words in the Swedish language.

description: Irritable Bowel Syndrome (IBS) is a debilitating illness for sufferers. Treatments for IBS vary include changes to diet, anti-spasmodic medications, muscle relaxants, and stress reduction. Unfortunately, these treatment methods do not help every person with IBS. So how can hypnotherapy help? Over a decade of scientific research has shown hypnotherapy to be successful for alleviating the symptoms of irritable bowel syndrome and it can produce positive results in over 80% of the people who use it. Hypnotherapy first helps by relaxing the body. Relaxation improves blood flow to the gut - something that stress tends to inhibit - and so improves digestion and the movement of food through the bowel. Visualisation techniques used during the therapy, sometimes termed as "gut related therapy" help to aid the relaxation and reduce the painful symptoms. It is a uniquely comfortable form of treatment. It is relaxing, easy, enjoyable and completely without negative side-effects. Don't just trust us, read what some of our recent customers had to say:- "Dear Mr. Roberts, You do not know me, but I recently purchased the IBS Rx CD from you and I thought you might like to know of the outcome. I have suffered from IBS for 25 years on and off and have tried literally so many Rx's over the years, to no avail. I have had hypnosis several times, usually with good effect whilst undergoing the Rx with the therapist, but sadly not as much benefit from the tapes alone when using them by myself. They have all in their own way, allowed me to experience some degree of self-hypnosis and relaxation, but I have to say, I have never come across one quite like yours! It is wonderful. I really feel like I have been to those places and go so deep it is amazing. The way you use your voice is incredibly calming and I just love that feeling as if my body with all it's aches and pains does not belong to me during those times. I cannot yet comment upon how it has affected my IBS, it is too soon yet to know and I also have Endometriosis which means that at some times there is not much I can do about the pain no matter what I do. But in a general sense, these problems have made me feel very stressed and panicky even when I do not have an attack, because I am always anticipating one. But put it this way, I normally have to play a tape nearly every day to get an effect. In your case, however, the general effects are instantaneous and seem to last days, my sense of well being and calmness is great. It lasts me 2 weeks! Also, I used to consider it penance to have to lie still and listen to the other tapes, couldn't seem to settle. Whereas I find myself looking forward to yours as a treat. Anyway, I'll sign off now. Just thought you might like to know the effectiveness of your therapies. I am a Registered Nurse myself, so I know how important it is to be aware of results. Many thanks." Rita O'Neill, Bradford, UK

This app is for all developers who are developing a app using App Inventor and want to learn more about the activity starter component. App Inventor ActivityStarter lets you play with intent activities and has more than 150 example demo activities. This app is actually a kind of Activity Starter component. You can make your own activity with all the fields you have in the Activity Starter component in App Inventor and execute the activity. If you want to learn more about the activity starter component in app inventor or are you looking for example activities, then this app is for you! In this app you will find example intent activities such as: -Action and classes to all android settings. -open, edit and view content such as image, audio, video or a file. -Search for content on web or phone. -Call, Dial, Email, SMS, MMS. Pick, Call or edit contact -Geo-location activities for Google Maps, Street view or other route app. -Photo and video activities -Google play and install and uninstall apps activities -Save text to sdcart, copy text to clipboard. Share text with Whatsapp, Hangouts, Drive, Dropbox, Mega. -External App inventor tools activity demos for AsUtil, Phone Picker for App Inventor, vkTools * More about App Inventor maintained by the Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT). http://appinventor.mit.edu/ * Note that this app has a lot of permissions because it has to be able to do any activity that you can make in app inventor. * You can also download the source code of this app, see http://code.google.com/p/appinvactivitystarter

This is the full and free version of "Where Am I? GeoCode" for Android(earlier known as "Geocoding" application for Android). This application is enables you to find the latitude and longitude of any address you specify and view on the map! Developed by a 13year old developer! Way to use this Application: Enter the address in the “Address field” for which you would like to generate the GeoCode. Eg : Maidenhead SL6 4HN, UK (enter full address for more accurate results) : 910 , Rockefeller Drive , Sunnyvale , CA 94087 (enter full address for more accurate results) : Wilson Garden, Bangalore, 560027 (enter full address for more accurate results) The "GeoCode" button will convert the specified address to latitude and longitude. The latitude and longitude generated can be viewed at the bottom-right of your screen next to the “About” button. The "Set Current Location as Address” button will automatically set the Address field to your current location. The "Save Address" button will save the address entered in the address field to the history. The "Delete Address" button is used to delete any previously entered address from the history. The "Load Address" button is used to copy any address from the history into the address field. The "Map It" button is used to view the “GeoCoded address” in map or satellite view. Feel free for any queries at sivan.sundar@gmail.com Your valuable ratings and comments are most welcome. Tested and working in HTC LEGEND!

Have you ever wanted to impress your friends with magic? Maybe you've always considered magic just too difficult. Ever thought it was possible to do a magic coin trick with your android smartphone? Well, look no further than the Magic Coin Trick. Here's a magic trick that anyone can do. All you need is the trusty magic coin trick software and be ready to amaze your friends. How the trick works is simple. Hide a coin in the hand you are holding the phone with. On the phone screen, select a coin. Move the coin around on the smart phone to show how real the coin is. Five seconds after you release the coin on the screen, the coin slowly will disappear. In the five seconds, tell them that you've trapped the coin inside... or that you've magically digitized the coin using a space aged digitizer. Finally, the coin disappears. Out of nowhere, drop the real coin from your hand. As the real coin magically appears right before their eyes, you'll be the toast of the town with this trick. This is a magic trick for anyone beginners or experts. Besides coin, you can even choose a paper clip to perform this magic. Keywords: Magic, trick, coin, paper clip, amazing, fun, magician, disappear, friend, quarter, dime, penny, nickel, cool.

The classic strategy game 'Hammurabi' (originating in 1968) has arrived for the Android Smartphone! Rule the Kingdom of Sumeria by managing your precious resources: land, people, and food. During each year of your reign (typically 10 years), your steward, Hammurabi, will ask you the following questions: 1) HOW MANY ACRES DO YOU WISH TO BUY? 2) HOW MANY ACRES DO YOU WISH TO SELL? 3) HOW MANY BUSHELS DO YOU WISH TO FEED YOUR PEOPLE? 4) HOW MANY ACRES DO YOU WISH TO PLANT WITH SEED? At the end of your ruling term, your performance will be evaluated and then compared with famous rulers from the past! This version stays true to the input methods of the original game - you can enter only one response at a time. Settings for 'Difficulty' and 'Term Length' can be adjusted, affecting gameplay strategy.

description: Get the wallpapers you always wanted in the easiest way! Just write what you want to see in your wallpaper, and this live wallpaper will download online images automatically! Write anything! The name of your favourite artist, sport, city or whatever you like, and see the images appear one after another. Every image you want, in just one live wallpaper. And the best part is... this app downloads really fast, as images will be downloaded later from internet when needed (and that's very fast too!) You can also decide if you want the wallpaper to update only using Wi-Fi or with any internet connection type (Using 3G/4G connections may have a cost, but you can avoid it updating with Wi-Fi only). You can setup how fast images will update, add great decoration effects, choose different size options and much more! Smart image fitting technology will make all images look great in any screen size! Try it! If you love this wallpaper as we do, you can download PRO version, including even more features. Images are downloaded from public websites directly to your device as needed, but images may have copyright, please check for licenses before using them.

Take aim at the boxes and shoot! You will be packing balls in color boxes across 100 challenging levels and become a professional packer! Aim for the boxes and shoot the balls through elevators, walls, revolving doors, conveyor belts and much more! Use machines wisely to open your way to the right boxes and pack them all! Pack all the balls fast before you run out of time, but beware... don't miss too much or you will run out of balls too! Pack the Ball is much more than just an aiming and shooting game. This game requires some logic and it may take a lot of thinking to make it through very brain-challenging levels! (Don't worry! There are three difficulty levels anyway!) Be a good packer and try to get three golden stars at each level. Compete with your Facebook friends and see who is the best packer! Enjoy hours and hours with this addcitive free shooting game! More levels and machines coming on each update! FEATURES ● 100 challenging and entertaining levels and growing. ● 3 difficulty levels (Easy, Normal, Hard) ● Automatically detects your skills level! ● Facebook Ranking, also invite your friends to play Pack the Ball with you. ● Levels and overall game ranking. ● 3 golden stars rewards on each level. ● Lots of machines to play with! (Elevators, Fans, Switches, Revolving Doors, Seesaws, Conveyor Belts) ● Gravity changes! (No gravity, or weird gravity levels) ● Bouncing boxes and nuclear bombs. ● Realistic physics engine. ● Specially designed to look great on phones and tablets. ● Optimized to work smoothly on every device. ● Graphics options available to increase performance. ● Avaiable in English and Spanish. ● Just 4mb! Fast downloads! Little space used! ● It's free! HOW TO PLAY ● Hold down your finger in the bottom left corner of the screen and move it to aim. ● Move your finger farther from the cannon to shoot faster. ● Release your finger to shoot. ● Pack those colored balls in the boxes with the same color!
release_text: - Fixed problem when starting the game. - Improved performance. - Reduced memory errors.

description: Teddy Bear Machine is an exciting and addictive game based on the classic Claw Machines we all have played with! Have fun with 110 challenging levels, racing against time to collect the toys with your claw. Levels get harder and harder, having more toys to collect but also some other stuff bothering to make it more complicated. But don't worry, you can choose between four difficulty levels to adjust the game to your skills. You will start collecting the funny teddy bear, but soon you will be collecting Tennis balls, Volley balls, Soccer balls, Basket balls, and even the classic Rubik Magic Cubes. But it won't be easy, some long firefighter trucks can block some of those toys and you will have to fight to get them. If you are running out of time you can also collect a clock to get some valuable extra seconds. Play each level faster and faster until you get all three medals, and climb positions in the level and the global rankings. This game will give you hours and hours of fun on your phone or your tablet! Teddy Bear Machine uses realistic physics laws to simulate claw and toys movements, giving you an immersive game experience where you feel like playing in the real world machine. Enjoy playing with this great Teddy Picker! Being one of the most lightweight games for Android, you won't have to worry about your phone available memory. Just download and have lots of fun! FEATURES • 110 challenging and entertaining levels. (70 free levels) • 4 difficulty levels (Easy, Normal, Hard, Very Hard) • Levels and overall game ranking. • Bronze, Silver and Gold medal rewards on each level. • 8 different toys to collect. • Bonus time clocks. • Play on 6 different locations going from a recreation center to a luxurious casino. • Realistic physics engine. • Specially designed to look great on phones and tablets. • Optimized to work smoothly on every device. • Graphics options available to increase performance. HOW TO PLAY • Hold down your finger to make the claw move towards your finger's position. • Tap the screen to open or close the claw. • Take the toys above the dashed line to collect them. TEDDY BEAR MACHINE PRO Get "Teddy Bear Machine Pro" to play 40 extra levels and remove all advertisements: http://goo.gl/3qBY3

This free application handles hundreds of animated emoticons (gif). This is the main application , the emoticons are contained in separate packages in the store and available for download . The main screen displays the list of installed packages ( empty at first installation ) and the list of available packages (no need to look for them just click the name , and the store will be open for download) you can share and use the emoticons in various ways. Press the question mark button in the main screen to see some examples . you can add emoticons to a list of favorites ( which you can sort by date or package ) for quick access . the application stores the last 100 emoticons shared in chronological order The application takes up very little memory space, you can install all the packages you want and keep only the ones you like! Additional packages will be made ​​available over time.

This application contains many of the works of Leonardo da Vinci carefully cataloged. The main screen provides a quick view of the categories accompanied by an explanatory image and title (if the title is not entirely visible you can touch the image of the category to make it slide). Long touch the image of the category to diplay the gallery with all the thumbnails. Touching a thumbnail will open the enlarged work and you can navigate in current section using the gallery below. You can perform various actions on the work currently displayed using the buttons at the bottom. Using the buttons: 1. Back arrow: Back to previous view 2. Four arrows: Displays the current work in full screen (you can choose the external program of your choice. Example Gallery) 4. Phone Icon: Set as Background currently displayed work (will be displayed a dialog box for confirm) Thanks

description: "TRAK is a great Brain Training Game." by Dr. Nakamura In fact TRAK is extremely addictive and the best puzzle game you've ever seen. It’s a modern combination of a puzzle, memory and brain trainig game. A perfect Brain Fitness Game for everybody between the age of 3 and 70 to focus and boost up your concentration. What is Brain Fitness? Brain fitness is the capacity of a person to meet the various cognitive demands of life. It is evident in an ability to assimilate information, comprehend relationships, and develop reasonable conclusions and plans. Brain fitness can be developed by formal education, being actively mentally engaged in life, continuing to learn, and exercises designed to challenge cognitive skills. Healthy lifestyle habits including mental stimulation, physical exercise, good nutrition, stress management, and sleep can improve brain fitness. On the other hand, chronic stress, anxiety, depression, aging, air pollution, decreasing estrogen, excess oxytocin, and prolonged cortisol can decrease brain fitness as well as general health. TRAK was and is developed to help you increasing your concentration and brain memory by a simple puzzle game. It's simple to learn, easy to play, but surprisingly difficult to be the best! Don’t believe it? Try it! [H] – HOW TO PLAY • In every level different amount of tiles get coloured • Concentrate & Memorise the coloured tiles • Track the tiles [F] – FEATURES • Simple Gameplay Mode • Unlimited levels for endless fun • Great Gameplay Sounds • Ranking of worldwide Players (play with your friends!) [C] – CONTACT FB – facebook.com/traktiles TW – twitter.com/traktiles or contact us by trak@citrusmedia.at Do you enjoy TRAK? Then please rate it, share it and play it.

description: Meteorites destroyed the worlds power supply lines. Help to built up new connections. The game starts at Europe. Your goal is to connect Start- and Endblock in more than 100 levels. Nextstop provides an information service in real time for all public transport lines of Basel . The current timetable and information of departure times of all stations are at your hands in no time. Additionally, to allow a better orientation, stations can be displayed on a road map. For route calculation, the departure and destination points can be either stations or positions on the road map. Nextstop shows you your route, from door to door including all footpaths. With nextstop you get important information for your travel all the time and always up to date. Start nextstop and see immediately the departures of surrounding stations! Features: * Automatically shows all public transit routes near you * Find departure times from stations * Find stations and get directions * Multimodal trip planner from door to door * Display stations in road map * Route including footpaths and taxi * Uses real-time predictions * Text message ticket generator (single / day ticket) * Network plan - including Nightliner * Traffic disruptions, maintenance and news

Zeigt die Spritpreisdaten der Energie-Control Austria ( http://www.spritpreisrechner.at ) übersichtlich für dein Smartphone an. Rechtliches: Das Preistransparenzgesetz, BGBl. I Nr. 54/2011, sowie die Preistransparenzverordnung, BGBl. II Nr. 246/2011, die am 2. August in Kraft getreten ist, verpflichtet alle Tankstellenbetreiber in Österreich, Preisänderungen bei Superbenzin 95 und Dieselkraftstoff zu melden. Für die Richtigkeit und Vollständigkeit der Daten wird keine Haftung übernommen. Wichtiger Hinweis: Enthält nur Daten für Österreich! Tags: Benzin Treibstoff Diesel billig billiger tanken Tankstellen Österreich spritpreisrechner spritpreis Shows the fuel price data of E-Control ( http://www.spritpreisrechner.at ) clearly for your smartphone. Disclaimer: The price transparency, BGBl. I Nr. 54/2011, as well as price transparency Regulation, BGBl. II Nr. 246/2011, which entered into force on August 2, obliges all service station operators in Austria, to report changes in the price of premium petrol 95 and diesel fuel. No liability is assumed for the accuracy and completeness of the data. Important Note: Only includes data for Austria! Tags: Gasoline Fuel Diesel cheap cheaper refuel gas stations Austria Spritpreisrechner Spritpreis

Somewhere in the universe, eavesdropping a dialog between Captain Picard and his crew… "Captain, this is fascinating! This new tool knows the names of the mountains I am looking at." description: Park.ME – the intelligent smartphone-solution informs you always and everywhere about Short-term-parking – parking zone – parking areas – tariffs – actual fees – park-tickets … Short-term parking zone? Yes/No? No ticket, no small change but many questions? park.ME takes care of it! park.ME by TRAFFICPASS allows uncomplicated and carefree parking in 12 Austrian and 8 German cities. Whenever and wherever you want to park – park.ME autonomously recognises: • your geographical position • short-term parking zones with more informations like: o tariff o max. parking-duration o reminder your parking ticket is expiring More park.ME features: • Integrated Carfinder, included • license plate selection and management • Quickstart function Looking for traffic signs, parking machines, or selling points for prepaid parking vouchers are history! Register now via www.trafficpass.com and use all the advantages of our app and services in: BAD HALL – BAD HOMBURG – BAD OLDESLOE – BADEN BEI WIEN – BERLIN – BINGEN – BLUDENZ – GRAZ – HANAU – INNSBRUCK – KLOSTERNEUBURG – KÖLN – KREMS AN DER DONAU – LINZ – MAINZ – SALZBURG – ST. JOHANN in TIROL – WIEN – WIESBADEN - Parkplatz der WKO Steiermark – ZELL am SEE. HOW? Only by 3 steps: 1 - Park your vehicle 2 - Start the park.ME app 3 - Press the START button To stop your parking action: simply press the STOP button! (Note: to use park.ME data connection and activated GPS needed!) YOUR BENEFITS? • up-to-date informations (short-term parking zones, tariffs, max. parking duration, etc.) • no charge for sms • no pre-payment required • easy to use • service available in 19 cities (Austria and Germany) • 1 user account for your family / your company and for all your cell phones and vehicles • transparent overview of all parking transactions and invoices • split invoices, if needed • group invoices by cost units • special conditions for business clients Users of traditional mobile phones can also use our SMS parking Service. Parkticket runs out? No problem – park.ME always reminds you on time! For all our customers we offer a free service line! For more information visit our homepage (www.trafficpass.com) or contact our service-hotline free of charge: +43 699 15939316 from Austria, +49 234 52009855 from Germany Forget old-fashioned tickets and machines! Welcome to the future, join park.ME! Try our other services as well: toll.ME - the comfortable service to pay for special toll roads in Austria More information on www.trafficpass.com Follow us on: facebook - https://www.facebook.com/trafficpasscom twitter - https://twitter.com/trafficpass google+ - https://plus.google.com/+Trafficpasscom/posts
release_text: Zusätzliche Benachrichtigungen Anrainerparkflächen für Wien ergänzt. Unterstützung der Sprachen Deutsch, Englisch und Türkisch

description: In response to user feedback, the updated MotorMouth App now has site level pricing data to help you decide where to buy based on your current location. With all the great features you have come to know that enable you to determine the right time to buy and maximise your saving in the price cycle, you can now see, at a glance, the prices (where available) for your default fuel type at your nearest service stations on the ‘Pricing Map’, helping you to make an informed choice on where to buy. MotorMouth collects site level data via four methods: - Electronically, twice a day from Informed Sources - Manually, collected by our drivers - (For Perth) Sourced from government WA FuelWatch - Direct from service station site operators, who can input their prices using our online service www.mypriceboard.com CAUTION: While no site prices on the Pricing Map (shown at the time of screen refresh) will be older than 24 hours, make sure you check how old a price is by viewing the Priceboard screen. Each price has the time/date of its capture clearly displayed. MotorMouth also obtains aggregate data from Informed Sources every 15 minutes to enable you to make your fuel purchase decisions based on the most comprehensive pricing data available across Australia. Understand the current position of the price cycle for your city with our rolling 31-Day Price Cycle Chart. Work out when you should next fill-up with our exclusive 7-Day Price Outlook. Identify the price you should Buy Below at any given time within any area regardless of whether or not site level pricing data is available. Remember, if you fill up at an expensive station, it might cost you an extra 2 cents per litre, but if you fill up on the wrong day it could cost you 15 cents per litre. It’s not where to buy that is key – but WHEN! NOTE: All pricing information screens are limited to a set number of searches each week. These are reset every Sunday evening. This has been included as a precautionary measure to try and avoid our data being misused. You will see the ‘Remaining Checks’ available at the bottom of these screens. On top of all this, in the ‘Find a Site’ section MotorMouth also enables you to locate service stations not only based on their address but also the brand, available fuels and/or facilities. It can even tell you how to get there. Interactive mapping is provided so all the common gestures apply including drag and drop for street view imagery. Simple and easy to use supporting intuitive gestures and at a glance insight through charts and green, amber, red man indicators to show the current price climate and outlook for the coming week. This nationwide app supports all major fuel types available in Australia: • ULP – Unleaded Petrol 91 RON • E10 – Unleaded Petrol with up to 10% Ethanol • PULP95 – Premium Unleaded Petrol 95 RON • PULP98 – Premium Unleaded Petrol 98 RON • LPG – Liquefied Petroleum Gas • DSL – Diesel • Premium Diesel FEATURES LIST: Insights & Information: • Location based data to show the closest service stations and their prices (where available) • Simple Green Man, Amber Man, Red Man concept to help you decide when or how much to buy (top-up -vs.- fill up) • Area specific fuel price information to let you know what is a reasonable price to pay • Click-through functionality from brand icons on maps to provide the address, phone number, site photo, available fuels, and facilities at each site Search (‘Find a Site’ section): • Use your device GPS (if available) or enter the suburb or postcode • Fast Search auto completion and location information for majority of suburbs & postcodes • Filter site map by Brands, Fuel Types and Facilities User Input & Feedback: • Provide feedback in-app to allow us to make changes where necessary

The South Australian Carpool is a free, online service for anyone who wants to save money, meet new people and reduce their carbon footprint while travelling to work or study. It takes two minutes to join the network and then the software will search its database and match you with other people travelling in the same direction
release_text: Mar 2012 V2.1 - FAQ and T&C changes Feb 2012: V1.9 - logo and presentation changes Feb 2012: V1.6 - changes to splash page Feb 2012: V1.4 - Changes to launch and splash Feb 2012: V1.3 - Correct some images Feb 2012: V1.2 - Address crash on message refresh Feb 2012: First release

description: You can now try WikiCamps for free for the first 14 days then upgrade to the full version. WikiCamps is a dynamic user generated camping app for Australia. What does this mean? It means all the sites are added, edited and shared by users like yourself! Wikicamps also works offline with the ability to download all site and user content, as well as a high quality offline map. The database is constantly growing and always being updated with the latest information about sites from all over Australia. With over 19,500 listings already, join the largest and fastest growing camping app in Australia. Listings including Caravan Parks, Camp Sites, Backpacker Hostels, Day Stops, Points of Interest and Information Centres. Each site has loads of information to help you plan your get away from activities including swimming, fishing, 4x4ing, pet rules, Wi-Fi hotspots, pricing, toilets, showers and heaps more. You can use Wiki Camps to add and view photos from other happy campers all around Australia. So you can see what the camp site is like before you go there. Rate sites as you go and add them to your own personal favourites list. With heaps of extra gadgets including: * Satellite dish pointer * Camping Checklist * Home Clock * Chat Forum * Compass * High Quality Offline Map

Calculate your postage, create your label, pay and lodge your parcels on the go, anytime, with our free Parcel Send App. We can also come to your nominated address to pick your parcels up. It’s that convenient! - Register your user details to allow greater access to time saving functions or simply sign in as a guest - Drop off at your local Australia Post Retail outlet or order a pickup for added convenience - Select a flexible payment option that suits you - credit card, PayPal or your Australia Post Business Credit Account - Track your parcels - Save your frequently used parcel sizes so you don’t have to enter the dimensions every time
release_text: Refreshed the design, simplified the steps for sending a parcel and enhanced the summary screen – including the introduction of a new edit function.

description: CPA Congress brings together over 10,000 finance, accounting and business professionals in a global conversation that will help convert innovative ideas into practical action plans. CPA Congress is delivered globally in 13 locations including Melbourne, Sydney, Canberra, Brisbane, Hobart, Adelaide, Darwin, Perth, Auckland, Singapore, Malaysia, Hong Kong and London. Our CPA Congress app will provide all the information you’ll need while attending this year. Use our app to: • View the program information • Explore session content • Access speaker information • View the venue map • Connect with exhibitors and sponsors • Keep up to date with live news • Provide survey feedback and participate in live polls

Complete jigsaw puzzles while learning about musical instruments and identifying the sounds they make. *** From the award winning developer of the Connect the Dots educational game series *** This educational and fun App helps young children learn the common musical instruments and the sounds that each one makes while developing their hand eye coordination and puzzle solving skills. It's a unique early learning game with realistic sounds and photo quality pictures which toddlers, preschoolers, and kindergarten age children will enjoy. Kids Musical Instrument Jigsaw Puzzles is different to other puzzle Apps because it has: •high quality images set against photographic scenes that look stunning on High Definition (HD) and retina displays of both tablets and smart phones •realistic sound effects used for every musical instrument •covers most common musical instruments as well as some lesser known ones •puzzles that can be replayed again after solving •increasing difficulty as your child progresses through the games in three distinct levels •no advertising •supports the following languages: English, German, French, Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Spanish, Arabic, Russian, Italian, Persian, Turkish, Polish, Indonesian, Vietnamese, Romanian, Swedish, Thai, Norwegian, Malay, Greek, Finnish, Dutch and Danish. Kids Musical Instrument Jigsaw Puzzles comes with a selection of free games that can be easily upgraded through a single in-app purchase to enable all puzzles. By upgrading from the Free App to the full version you’ll also be entitled to all additional puzzles and features added in future releases. Jigsaw puzzle games have traditionally been a fun and early education learning tool for tots, toddlers, preschoolers, kindergarten, and early school age children and are a stimulating game for girls and an exciting game for boys. •2 year old and 3 year old children can practice their hand eye coordination and matching skills as they progress through the puzzles on each level as well as exploring the musical instrument sounds •4 year old and 5 year old kids can learn to read, write and pronounce the musical instrument names on completion of every puzzle We hope you enjoy playing what we believe is one of best early education games for toddlers and preschoolers. Check out our other puzzle games and acclaimed kids educational apps at http://espacepublishing.com or follow us on Facebook for the scoop on new app releases and free giveaways at http://facebook.com/espacepublishing .

HOT FM is the home of the biggest shows, the hottest gossip, celebrity interviews, and what’s hot right now! Once you've downloaded the app, choose your station for the ultimate HOT FM experience, including: Queensland: 103.1 Townsville, 107.9 Central QLD, 103.5 Cairns, 100.3 Mackay & The Whitsundays, 97.9 Mareeba, 94.7 Emerald, 102.5 Mount Isa, 95.1 Roma, 95.9 Charters Towers WA: 95.7 Bunbury, 106.5 Albany, 97.9 Kalgoorlie, 96.5 Northam, 100.5 Narrogin, 102.3 Esperance, 94.9 Katanning, 105.1 Merredin Features: » Intelligent streaming, you’ll get CD-quality radio on a WiFi connection and less drop-outs when you’re on the go. » Guide: see what’s playing now and what’s coming up. » Set an alarm to wake-up to your favourite shows. » Listen to the best bits of your favourite shows anytime and anywhere with show podcasts. » Contact the studio directly by phone or email. » Connect with us on Facebook and Twitter. This application utilises open source libraries, for details please see http://austereo-static.com.au/mobile-apps/open-source-libraries.html
release_text: Now includes access to My Local Auction

description: User-friendly Android app for ING DIRECT accounts including transaction, savings, business, home loans and super. Online banking: - Choose to check the balances of favourite accounts without logging in - Pay anyone, including new people, new billers and anyone in your Address Book - See full transaction history (up to three years) - Transfer money to linked accounts - Let others know you've paid them via SMS or email - Place your Orange Everyday Visa Debit card on hold, and remove from hold when you need to - Set up user profiles to allow multiple customer to use the same device - Activate new, reissued or replaced Orange Everyday Visa Debit cards - You can now create, edit, view and delete scheduled payments - Read up on new features and updates, all in one place - Sign up for an Orange Everyday - In a few simple steps you can now sign up for an Orange Everyday bank account - Let us know when you’re travelling overseas to help us monitor your card and prevent it from being blocked unnecessarily - Find out your current interest rates and benefits for accounts you hold with ING DIRECT Bank@Post locator: Finds the nearest Bank@Post location and helps you search for outlets by suburb or postcode. Contact information: Contact details for ING DIRECT 24/7 Australia-based customer care – 133 464. Current interest rates: Check the latest ING DIRECT interest rates across savings, business, home loans and super. Our mobile website: Links to ingdirect.com.au for secure mobile banking on other devices. Terms of use and Security: Read about the terms of use governing your use of this mobile application plus ING DIRECT security policy and information. * For the curious part of you Normal data charges apply. Please check with your mobile phone service provider for details. Using your mobile to bank with ING DIRECT is subject to certain limitations as not all internet banking features are available. ING DIRECT is a division of ING Bank (Australia) Limited ABN 24 000 893 292 AFSL 229823.
release_text: + You can now see your account balances in the ING DIRECT Widget without logging in. + Bug fixes and stability improvements.

description: A perfect starting point for any project, the Masters Home Improvement App is packed with features to help you every step of the way, from thought to finish. Shop * Browse & buy 30,000 home improvement products over 19 categories * Zoom images and view features & specifications * Check stock, get your items delivered or Click&Collect them from store Product Comparison * Scan an item in a competitor’s store and get the Masters price on the same item View DIY Articles, Videos, and handy hints & tips Find your closest store & the trading hours View our latest catalogue Got feedback? Please email us at feedback@masters.com.au so we can keep improving. Thanks very much, The Masters Team
release_text: - Minor Bug Fixes - Improved user experience

description: Find the right fare and remove the stress from your journey with the Qantas app. It’s about making flying a breeze. - View your upcoming trips - Be reminded when check-in opens, stay up-to-date with alerts for departure gate, boarding time, baggage carousel and more* - Get your boarding pass within the App or load into Samsung Wallet - Know when it’s time to leave for the airport, and find the route that’ll get you there - Create fare alerts for your favourite destinations and be notified of sales or offers and when fares fall below your preferred price - Access other travel products available through Qantas including hotels, cars, transfers and activities * Mobile check-in, in-app boarding passes and some alerts not available for all flights and all airports. Find out more at qantas.com/apps. Permissions: - Cellular data settings & Wi Fi connection information :  We use network access to provide you with relevant information when using the airport navigation functionality, to update flight status, and to complete your check in process. - Photo/Media/Files:  We use this to store relevant Airport maps and destination imagery on your device - Location:  We use your location to determine what assistance we can offer- including guidance to arriving to your departure airport. - Google Settings: We use this to help deliver our price alert and day of travel notifications to you.
release_text: In this updated version of the Qantas app we have: - Improved stability on startup - Introduced feedback for your Qantas flight within the app - Enhanced reliability of PressReader services - Resolved trip display issues on Lollipop (Android 5.0+) devices - Other bug fixes and enhancements

description: Searching for a New or Used Boat, just became a whole lot easier with 'Boat Sales'. Created exclusively by St Kilda Boat Sales, an industry accredited dealer based at the famous St Kilda Marina in the Melbourne suburb of Elwood. They are one of Australia’s premier boutique boat dealerships, brokerage and vendor agencies. This free application is ideal for those mariners on the GO... Boat Sales enables buyers, sellers and enthusiasts - to search the St Kilda Boat Sales database for New and Used boats they've got listed for sale. View full vessel inventories with pictures. You can also check the latest marine news, local weather and boating forecasts. Looking for the boat of your dreams? Now you can access our stock listings several weeks before our magazine advertising hits the streets. Get in early to avoid disappointment… "Making Dreams Happen" with St Kilda Boat Sales. Safe Boating Always!

Vero Drive Claims App helps make lodging your claim easy and stress free. This simple to use app lets you collect the accident information you need from the scene of the accident and send it to Vero. We will then contact you to start your claim. Once installed, simply set up your profile and this app is ready, should you ever need it. Key features - Guided claim process – helps you gather key information at the accident scene, so you don’t have to worry about missing anything. - Supports all accident types – single and multi vehicle accidents, storm damage, theft and windscreen-only claims. - Automatic GPS look up – retrieves your current location and time. - Advanced camera integration – captures photos of vehicle damage or imports from your camera roll. - Auto save – automatically saves entered data. - User profile setting – save time and stress by first setting up your profile. - Privacy protection – your information is stored on your device, is PIN enabled and only sent to Vero by a secure channel.
release_text: Minor change to photo screen layout. Minor change to claims questions.

description: The Australian Taxation Office app puts tax and super help in your hand, making it easier for you to conduct your tax and super affairs on the go. If you’re an individual, small business owner or self-managed super fund (SMSF) trustee, you can access relevant tax and super information and tools all in one place. The app has many features, some of which allow you to: - log on to our online services* for individuals where you can manage your tax and super online - record your work related expenses and trips using myDeductions - perform a quick assessment of the financial position of your small business using the Business performance check - use the tax withheld calculator - check the progress of your return - search for an Australian business number (ABN) using ABN Lookup - watch videos, access checklists and visit SMSF assist for other helpful information for SMSF trustees - access many other tools and calculators. * To access our online services for individuals, you need to have a myGov account linked to the ATO. Find out more at ato.gov.au The ATO app can automatically send usage data to us to help improve its services. You may choose to turn this off at any time. Stay tuned for new features and updates.
release_text: - myDeductions tool - Business performance check - Updates to the super guarantee contributions rate to align to current legislation - Updates to the tax withheld calculator instructions to align to the correct rates currently in the tool

description: Get the best of triple j with our official Android App. With this app, you can: • Stream triple j live • See live song names + recent tracks list • Add songs to ‘Tracks I Love’ + watch their film clips • Message presenters via SMS + Twitter • Listen to the latest programs + exclusive interviews on demand • Read Music News for the latest tour + festival info • Find your local frequency triple j – we love music (on your Android!) DATA CONSUMPTION ShoutCast AAC+ at 64kbps uses about 29 MB/hour. *** Note that you are responsible for the data transfer and consumption charges incurred by you when using any ABC app. The ABC disclaims all liability for such charges. *** TECHNICAL DETAILS triple j for Android is designed for devices running Android 4.0 and above. It has been designed for 1280 x 768 resolution screens and has been optimised to scale to other resolutions. SUPPORT We value your feedback; please send us compliments, suggestions and criticisms. Please contact us using the Email Developer link. We have used the latest Android SDK and have tested the app on a wide range of Android devices, but if you have any issues we would really like to hear from you with details of your phone, Android version and problem.
release_text: *New in triple j for Android 1.0.118.40* IMPROVED APP START-UP - Non-critical feeds now load in the background on start-up, so the app may load more quickly. BETA TALKBACK ACCESSIBILITY IMPLEMENTATION for the vision-impaired using TalkBack. Other BUG FIXES and stability improvements.

description: Unearthed is the largest source of free independent Australian music as well as new music recommendations from triple j and bands and artists you love. This app delivers 99,000 tracks of new Australian music in a range of genres, with hundreds of new tracks added weekly. You can: - listen to the tracks - download tracks - add tracks to playlists; and - share tracks with your friends. Too much to choose from? We’ve hand-selected some stand outs; try recommended tracks, featured and super user playlists and our weekly Unearthed podcasts. You can also stream Unearthed digital radio - it just got easier to find your new favourite band. *** Note that you are responsible for the data transfer and consumption charges incurred by you when using any ABC app. The ABC disclaims all liability for such charges ***
release_text: *New in triple j Unearthed for Android 3.0.118.22*: STAR RATINGS FIX BETA TALKBACK ACCESSIBILITY IMPLEMENTATION for the vision-impaired using TalkBack. Other BUG FIXES and stability improvements.

description: The Art of Science - Butterfly and Moth Paintings from the Scott Sisters Explore over 100 paintings of butterflies and moths by sisters Harriet and Helena Scott, colonial Sydney’s most famous natural history artists and see the latest scientific data. - Discover each painting in colourful detail - View current scientific data on each featured insect via links to the Atlas of Living Australia - Explore the history and biographies of the sisters and find out about the art of natural history illustration The Australian Museum is proud to make this historic collection available using mobile technology and showcase the science and art of the Scott sisters. Created by the Australian Museum, Beaconmaker and the NSW Department of Finance and Services.
