description: From DreamWorks Animation and JumpStart comes Madagascar Preschool Surf n' Slide™, an immersive themed game, where players join young Alex, Marty, Gloria, and Melman, and the entire Madagascar gang for a slip-sliding adventure in learning! Players will surf down amazing slides as they learn multitudes of preschool skills on their mobile device. Addictive Features: - 18 lessons across 6 subjects: Numbers, Letters, Colors, Shapes, Animals, and Critical Thinking - 4 Madagascar themed levels: New York Zoo, Antarctica, Africa, and Madagascar Jungle! - Sticker Book with 4 scenes and over 125 Madagascar themed stickers - Fast-paced arcade action going down the slides! - Designed for Preschoolers -- no confusing menus or navigation - Use your photos as the background for the Sticker Book - Unlimited play - each game flows right into the next - Tilt or Slider controls Players start out choosing their favorite Madagascar character to play with and pick a ride to slide on from surfboards, to snowboards, magic carpets, and even friendly turtles! Players slide down one of four slides collecting stars and avoiding obstacles. Players will encounter balloon characters in each slide that will challenge them to fun learning games! As they play learning games, they will earn stickers for their sticker book! If you like the game, please take the time to rate it! Email us at AppComments@adventure.com with your suggestions and comments as we cannot respond to reviews. We love to hear your ideas and feedback! Like us on Facebook for exclusive updates, discount offers and news about our virtual world. http://www.facebook.com/JumpStart Registration information is optional (children under 13 require parent registration). Will be used to notify of game fixes, updates, etc. along with allowing for future integration online. - Does NOT include ads - Does NOT link to Social networks - Does include links/information relative to other Knowledge Adventure games and apps - Does use analytics/data collection tools. Privacy Policy : https://policy-portal.truste.com/core/privacy-policy/Knowledge-Adventure/d588e732-4296-45b6-80f0-a40832b10dda
release_text: • New camera feature in Sticker Book which enables user to set custom backgrounds using device camera. • New More Games icon on Menu Screen which enables users to discover other JumpStart games with ease. • Minor bug fixes and optimizations for smoother gameplay.

واحد من أفضل لوحة المفاتيح العربية Linpus Arabic Keyboard is an exceptionally feature rich and easy-to-use keyboard that is designed to solve several Arabic input issues in Android Gingerbread. With Linpus Arabic Keyboard you can now join word and write from right to left if you have an Android phone with Gingerbread. In addition, Linpus Arabic Keyboard has a split keyboard option for tablet users and a host of features to make prediction and word selection quicker and more accurate. For example: As you are typing, the word prediction bar can be swiped left and right to quickly reveal more word options. Your local address book can also be imported so your contacts names can be easily added into your messages. Multilingual common symbols support Error-correction support Memory – Most used words are moved to front of list Google voice input support Emotion and Emoji support Sound and vibration settings Multiple themes & skins support User can adjust the keyboard button size in setting page ** We take your privacy very seriously. This app does not learn from password fields and all language data learned on your device is stored on your SD card and never transferred. Use of this app is subject to our robust privacy policy, which is there to protect your rights and privacy ** ======================================= v1.2.3 Update: 1. Add English auto correction feature; 2. Add Wood theme and China new year theme; 3. Add some Arabic words. v1.2.1 Update: 1. Add some emotions and put the button to candidate area; 2. Add some Arabic words.
release_text: v1.2.7 Update: 1. Add one more theme & skin, beautiful pink skin; 2. Add portrait size adjustment options; 3. Change the English dictionary; 4. Change the emoji layout. Linpus Arabic keyboard support android OS from 2.2 to 4.2. لوحة المفاتيح العربية مريحة وعملية

description: Linpus Keyboard has amazingly accurate next word prediction, auto-complete, and auto-correction, learning and getting smarter as you type. It also has many options to personalize and change the layout. This latest version, just released, has updated auto-complete and prediction learning from your previous word and your writing style to give you ever more accurate completions to what you want to say. It also corrects both based on spelling error and tapping the wrong key to allow you to type faster and freer. Key Features: Extremely smart auto-complete, prediction and correction. Resize – Change your keyboard to four different sizes to suit your fingers. Personalize – Includes many different skins. Splittable – For tablets split into 2 for easier typing on large screen Move – Adjust the position of your keyboard Space bar – Tap space bar to select highlighted most likely word. Auto-space – Choose to add auto-space or not. Auto-capitalization – Choose to auto-capitalize or not. Multi language typing – Swap between as many languages as you like. Arrow keys Contact address book importing Note: Linpus Keyboard default language is American English you can' find Linpus language packs through our keyboard settings.
release_text: v1.5.2 1. Excellent smart word predictions for English 2. Excellent smart auto-complete for English 3. Excellent smart auto-correction for English 4. Changed the candidate bar to contain only three words 5. Added three new themes: Black, wooden and Beige 6. Added different sizes of keyboard layout in the setting 7. Addded feature to make on-screen keyboard draggable 8. Added Space submmision: Press space bar to submit the highlighted word

description: Linpus Japanese Keyboard has the fastest reaction time and most accurate prediction of any Japanese keyboard, learning and getting smarter as you type. It can predict your next word faster and more accurately than other keyboards because of its huge dictionary of words and Linpus' exhaustive testing of word patterns. In addition, when you start to type the last part of Linpus' work kicks in as Linpus Keyboard then starts to learn from the words you personally use to make that prediction even more accurate. But Linpus Japanese keyboard is not just the most accurate it is also the most fun, complete in terms of input methods and most customizable. It supports both QWERTY and Kana 9-grid layout and Kana and Kanji output, and has re-size keyboard options and many different themes to choose from. A full list of features are below: Amazingly accurate prediction that learns and gets better the more you type Current and next word prediction. One tap to select and send typed words to prediction on bar for editing Splittable keyboard for tablet users 9-grid layout of Kana Integration of Japanese and English into one QWERTY keyboard. Japanese vocabulary fuzzy-input-method Japanese predictive-input-method Japanese vocabulary memory feature Japanese full sentence input feature Japanese and English mixed input Local address book import Keyboard layout candidate view gesture support Emotion symbols Google voice input Edit the words memorized in your dictionary Pannable prediction bar Arrow keys (cursor up and down and move around) Multiple skins and themes Resize keyboard option Long press to get comma, period, question mark and exclamation mark on first screen Note: To be used on your Android device(Smart Phone or Tablet), Linpus Japanese Keyboard must be enabled in "Settings"->"Language & keyboard settings". Search key words: IME Keyboard LinpusIME Japanese Linpus voice input useful practical contact touch key

description: Instead of having to choose between different styles you can just swipe between layers and mix your own, see the video for more info! This way I can fix problems quicker and add more widgets faster! Note that because this app is an installer that will install the widgets, it is possible to uninstall it and still have the widgets in case you don't want it to show up inside your app drawer. It is important to know that when you uninstall it, you won't receive any further updates unless you install it again! The new dashboard app includes: Version 1.4 • Integrated fix for icons, press "install icon font" if no icons show up in the music widgets (just letters)! • links to Zooper Pro and Media utilities • Instructions to set up Media Utilities • link to a youtube video that shows how to switch between different colours Requirements: Zooper Widget Pro must be installed, otherwise this app won't work. Media Utilities is needed for the music control.
release_text: Version 1.4 • Completely new dashboard app! • Integrated fix for icons, press "install icon font" if no icons show up in the music widgets (just letters)! • added links to Zooper Pro and Media utilities • added link to a youtube video that shows how to switch between different colours • included link to gallery that shows some setups ;)

description: In Kitty Can Fly, players take control of Kitty the cat. But he's no ordinary cat... KITTY CAN FLY! Kitty one day discovered that if he spins his body fast enough, he can create enough torque to counteract the force of gravity, thus achieving liftoff and venturing where no cat has ever dreamed of going before! Download today and help Kitty reach new heights and epic distances in Kitty Can Fly! -----Gameplay----- Kitty Can Fly is a one-of-a-kind 2D distance game for android devices! Enjoy easy to learn, yet difficult to master one-click controls in Kitty Can Fly! Simply tap to make Kitty gain altitude. Let go to send him into a nosedive. Just make sure Kitty has enough energy before you take off! -----Power-ups----- Kitty Can Fly makes use of a multitude of power-ups designed to keep Kitty flying! Use the bouncy bubble to ricochet off the ground and back into the stratosphere. Or fly through the rainbow for a massive boost in speed and distance! -----Leaderboards----- Kitty Can Fly integrates complete use of the Google Play Services Leaderboards! Compete with the public or your friends to get the day's, week's, or all-time best distances and heights! -----Contact Info----- Questions, comments, concerns? Please consider sending me an e-mail about any problems before you give a bad rating. Give me a chance to help you out! Official Game Site: http://kittycanflyapp.wix.com/kitty-can-fly Developer site: www.onionystudios.wordpress.com e-mail: evanpacyna@gmail.com
release_text: -Made outer space much higher -Added extra UI elements -Added Google Play Achievements -Created new leaderboards -Reworked Physics

Download now and you'll automatically get new updates.

description: Widgets not appearing on 4.1+ (Jellybeen) devices? Please email for eas fix. *You must have UCCW installed on your phone to use this theme.* Download UCCW for free from the Play Store.. Please support my work with a 5 star rating. I have many more amazing themes coming your way! This theme has been tested on the HTC One X, Galaxy Note 2 and the Galaxy S3 and works perfectly using Nova Launcher Prime. It will also work on many other devices but have yet to be tested. I will post when it has been confirmed to be working on other devices. Don't want to take the risk? Check back regularly for an updated device selection. Please email me with any issues rather than posting them in the review section of the Play store. Thank you. Not personalized enough? Through the UCCW editor you can change the font and background colors to your liking as well as your hotspots to your shortcuts. Tutorials: Note.. This may look difficult, but it really isn't. I wrote this for anyone who has never touched UCCW or a custom launcher. Every step is here. Nova Launcher Prime setup: Press menu on your phone Press Nova settings >desktop>desktop grid. Set rows to 8 and columns to 12. back out.. >Width margin. Set to none. back out.. >Height margin. Set to none. back out.. Make sure "show shadows" is unchecked > "home screens" and remove all but one screen. back out.. >"scroll effect" set to none. back out.. >Wallpaper scrolling. Set to off. back out.. Uncheck "infinate scroll". Scroll to the bottom and open the "advanced" tab and check "resize all widgets". Back out to main menu >Dock. Uncheck "enable dock". back out.. >Look and feel. Uncheck "show notification bar". back out.. >Gestures and buttons. >Swipe up. Click "app drawer". >Gestures and buttons. >Swipe down. Click "expand notifications". Done. UCCW setup: After you download the theme... Clear your homescreen of any icons or widgets Long press your homescreen Select "widgets" Click on UCCW Click the 4x4 widget Find and click one of the Phoenix skins Touch the white hand After the widget appears, long press it Click "re-size" and re-size it so it spans the width of your screen and half the height of the screen. Repeat this process for the other widget. Done. Changing colors and hotspots: Open your app drawer Find and click UCCW Press your phone menu key Click "Lock widgets (Hotspot mode)". Click "off". Go to your home page Click one of the widgets Here you can change any color you want If you mess anything up beyond simple repair just delete the widget and add it again. *Don't add the new widget through the UCCW editor as the softly widgets will not show up in the list. You must make a whole new widget by long pressing your home screen.* To change the hotspots... scroll to the bottom of the UCCW editor Click a hotspot and choose what you'd like to change it to. Once you're done editing... go back into your app drawer >UCCW >phone menu >Lock widgets (hotspot folders) >press "on". Enjoy your awesome screen! FAQ: How to change temperature units? Open the UCCW app in your app drawer >menu> check Celsius. Why does the skin not show up in the list? This is a Google related issue with some Jellybean devices. If you have this issue, email me. Ill send you a fix. Follow me on Google + for updates and new themes that Im working on. https://plus.google.com/112162095736133226513/posts

description: Now for every incoming call you receive, Caller Location will display location of caller, with city and State information and if you want ,it will be displayed on the map also. Do you want to track caller location then go for this application, it is a mobile call tracker. Call Location is sometimes urgent when you have to decide whether or not to pick a call from unknown numbers. Features: ☆ Caller Locator will help you to determine if you want to pick calls or not. ☆ Please note that this application tracks mobile number of USA, Canada and India only. ☆ The numbers which are ported may not be traceable by this application. ☆ No need of internet connection after you download this application. ☆ You can use this app without internet connection( works offline). Please email us if you have any query or feedback.

THIS IS A KIND OF TENNIS THAT EVERYONE CAN ENJOY EASILY. WITH LEVEL UP, YOU CAN GAIN A VARIETY OF CHARACTERS AND BACKGROUNDS. BOTH BEGINNERS AND EXPERTS CAN ENJOY IT ADJUSTING THE LEVEL OF DIFFICULTY. ★ Note: The dual-core phones (eg Galaxy S2) and later works. Language Support English, Japanese, Korean
This game will wake up your brain. Will be Increase your Agility, judgment, numeracy. Touch RGB is easy to enjoy anytime, anywhere. Recommend this moment (When bored, Rush hour, When resting)

Buckle up for a demolition derby of bullet riddled metal, fast cars, machine guns and awesome explosions. The rules are simple, every other car and stay alive yourself. The controls are using the phones tilt to steer and on-screen buttons to shoot and brake/gas. The gameplay is like a 7 car demolition derby race with machine guns and bombs. Touch the other cars on the screen to lock on them as a target for your weapons and draw a sight/healthbar around them. Extra points are scored for cars and objects they blow up as well as being the last surviving car. Features include realistic physics, 3D graphics and solid AI. The player first selects their car from a list of 7 cars, all with unique weapons,speeds and health. Muscle - An American muscle car hot-rod with a grenade launcher and an attitude Firebug - A VW Beetle with a flame thrower and a flare for destruction Sarge - A gung-ho army jeep laying down land mines and mayhem in his wake Deathbed - A pickup truck with a napalm mortar launcher and a burning desire to kill Lowbrow - A low-rider looking for a fight with a cold heart and heat-seeking missiles Fuzz - A cop car laying down the law with a siren that will stop you dead in your tracks Contract - A utility van with a force field and a force to be reckoned with Next the player selects the which realistic venue they would like to do battle in. Neighborhood strip-mall Baseball park Spooky cemetery Country farm Roman arena Then the battle royale is on, put the pedal to the metal and light up your enemies using either your M2 .50 cal. machine gun or your special weapon. Hit an enemy with a bullet or touch it on the screen and lock your sights on the target and keep hitting it until it turns into a carbomb. Blow up random objects as well and double your score for every killshot you make. Its not as easy as it sounds though because the bad guys have guns to and they are out to kill. You'll certainly know it when your hit because your device will vibrate every-time a bullet clips you. You'll have a BLAST playing with your pals and seeing who can beat the high score.

Control the machines in this Rampant Robot Factory to help one of the robots escape from the crystal mines. The almost worked-to-death robots are too tired to move their legs so you have to use your brain and fingers to help the robots through 30 levels of dangerous saws, fires and lavapits. Select the machines you want to control and use the slider to manipulate: -The speed of the Conveyour Belts. -Fling away the robots with the Flips. -Transport the robot around and above the dangers with the Magnet and Tesla.

description: Firehouse Scheduler is a must have Fire/EMS/Police shift Calendar. DO NOT BILL THE APP TO YOUR PHONE BILL!!! GOOGLE IS HAVING ISSUES WITH THIS!!! Now you can manage your hectic schedule in the palm of your hand. If your schedule has a pattern to it or it repeats after a certain amount of days then this application is for you! Firehouse Scheduler makes it easy for you to manage your schedule and whatever life throws at you. Firehouse Scheduler is great for family members and spouses of Firefighters, EMS/First Responders and Police Officers for managing when the work or setting up vacations and get togethers. If you have family members or friends that work a different schedule then you and you have trouble keeping up with their working days and off days you can create multiple calendars to keep up with their scheduler as well! Supports 99% of all shift work schedules. Not sure if yours will work? Please send your schedule to Support@LeakyNozzle.com and I will be happy to let you know. Having trouble setting up your schedule or not technology savvy and wondering how to use a feature? Put your mind at ease with our step by step tutorials for your Android devices. Get visual screenshots along with instructions on how to maneuver through the application so you aren’t missing out on features this fundamental app has to offer. Visit http://www.leakynozzle.com/Tutorials.html Create your own custom shift cycles (24, 14, 12, 10, or 8 hour shift schedules). Please visit our website at www.LeakyNozzle.com for features and to learn more about Firehouse Scheduler. There are a lot of features in this application and it may take you a day or two to learn your way through it. Please be patient as you learn it and I can assure you won’t be disappointed. Firehouse Scheduler is the #1 used and #1 rated Fire Shift Calendar! Just some of the many great features include: * Multiple custom schedules * Vacation stats * Sick stats * Comp Time and Holiday Time * Trades/Swaps and Trade/Swap Stats * Kelly Days * Overtime Stats * Paydays * Save to you SD card * Sync Google Calendar to Firehouse ( One way sync) * Bump/Sync calendar phone to phone and across platforms * Create custom stats for events * Manage events by allowing the user to enable/disable events in list * Create and keep track of Exposures * Keep track of Certification Expiration dates and be notified when coming due * Track C.E hours and classes * Create Custom Events and much much more! Remember I can not reply to questions left Android Market so please email your questions and concerns to LeakyNozzle@gmail.com Please remember to leave your rating!

description: Welcome to the endless underwater caves of the Pacific Ocean, which are full of dangers: from impassable bottlenecks and deep mines left over from World War II. You have to survive and adapt to the dangerous conditions of underwater caves with five different models of submarines, which may be equipped with radar, homing torpedoes, as well as to strengthen the armor of the boat.

The most beautifully brutal 3D Flappy Bird revenge experience. Play as a mercenary given one objective: to stymie a massive infestation of Flappy Birdmen clones. You have a special talent. You can control your bullet. Use this talent to destroy any Birdmen that get in your way. Had enough of those big beaked yellow frustration puffs? Here's your chance to take down as many as you can and help save the world. This game is a preview for the upcoming Ride the Bullet. If you have any questions about Flap the Birdlet, or want to keep up with my other development, head on over to http://blog.radjor.com/?page_id=46

Disable Ads for 99c **************************************** FEATURES **************************************** -Instant Play, a single Beginner level match -You are a Futures player level -Realistic ball physics accounting for different spins -Controls are simple and intuitive -Use Auto-Run mode to develop your shots, then challenge yourself in Free Run Mode by tapping the court to run -Hit lobs, slice, topspin, Flat, drop volleys, all with EASE! -Use Swipe gestures to control spins, straight for Flat / slice, circular for topspin -Focus on the match, not on controls! **************************************** SPECS **************************************** -The game runs at a smooth 60 frames per second on most armV7 devices. -Does have a frame rate hitch on 1st point of game launch.

description: "Can't we all just... dance?!" A brand new Android game from a brand new developer. Help Busy Bee and his friends pollinate as many flowers as they can. Don't miss too many and watch out for the perils of the bee world. This game is still in development so much more is yet to come. Development time has only been 3 months so far so expect the next update within a week. Please email me if you have any issues with the game. Once I know what the problem is, I can get started troubleshooting for you! Coming soon: Music, Better Sound FX, Leaderboards, Unlockable Characters, Achievements and much more... Thanks for checking out Busy Bee!
release_text: ***FINAL BETA RELEASE*** Leaderboard and achievements will be available in the next release ;) v0.1.5 Overhauled the flower/obstacle generator. Removed heaps of redundant animations that were causing lag. Flower colour is now independent of height. 2 new flower colours. Updated the sound effects. Added a pause button.

description: Guide the kid in his red car across 25 levels in this fast paced 2d platformer. Collect stars along the way. Have fun with some rising/dropping platforms , some broken platforms, some inclined platforms and some portals with changing day night weather effect. Avoid enemies like flying bats, lazy owls, jumping porcupines, stationary and rotating spikes, slow snails , even slower zombies, evil oysters and occasional lasers. Each level has time splits and a best time to beat. Have fun in this addictive, hard as nails, side scroller Features: Challenging 25 levels Unrealistic car with sort of realistic physics Different enemies including owls, bats,snails, zombies,spikes and lasers Various types of platforms and portals Cute kid with a car Credits **libgdx **box2d Sound Credits Caroline Ford JimBob Mike Koenig Try our other games:- Tap Shoot Zombie Choozak Balloon Shooter Speedboat Santa Polar Turtle Leap Permissions :- Permissions are used to show ads. Search terms :- kids, arcade, addictive, cool, games, hard Privacy: This app collects anonymous usage information for the purpose of improving the software. No personally identifiable information is collected. If you have any questions please contact us via the developer email listed.

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/redschnovic Review: http://www.realovirtual.com/foro/viewtopic.php?f=23&t=1786

description: ROSKA is FREE TO PLAY arcade platformer game, with speed tester combined with tap to fly mechanics in an endless platformer runner environment. Test your reaction speed on difficult obstacles, but don’t tap the wrong button! You can play safe to reach new levels, but take the risk and use your skills to get the best possible score - and share it with your best friends! Story: The waste treatment plant is the place where all the trash should end up. ROSKA is a cute little garbage bag whose somewhat short journey has come to an end and he is facing the horrifying disposal process line. However, he does not agree with being burned, crushed or even recycled and decides to fight the system. You must help ROSKA avoid the impending doom. With his feathery being he is good at flying but he needs your help evading the ripping saws, piercing spikes, burning lasers and other perilous waste obliterating obstacles he needs to face on the conveyor line in pursuit of freedom. Tap the right buttons with sufficient speed to keep ROSKA flying in the air! No piece of garbage can fly free from the horrors of the waste treatment plant. Will ROSKA be the first? Control ROSKA by tapping on four glowing gears with precise timing to flap his little plastic wings. Avoid anything that looks dangerous and don’t let those obstacles push you down from the conveyor line platform into the incinerator. Collect gold stars on the way to get points - ROSKA wants some glamour in his fleeting moments and those points prove to the world that you are the best possible help he has. Help ROSKA, beat the best high scores and share your success with the world! Features: - FREE TO PLAY - Speed test meets endless platform runner - Tap glowing gears to flap wings and fly - Avoid saws, spikes and other obstacles - Collect points to reach world ranking list - Be competitive and share your best score to your friends

description: 떨어지는 파스텔톤 자음, 모음, 낱말을 받아 먹으며 반복적으로 표시되고 말해주는 한글을 공부해요~ 아이들이 좋아하는 그림이나 사진을 배경그림으로 설정하고 아이들이 좋아하는 폰 외장메모리에 담긴 음악을 배경음악으로 자유롭게 설정하는 기능이 포함되어 아이들의 집중력을 더욱 키워줍니다. 이동은 케릭터를 기준으로 좌측을 터치하면 좌측 이동, 우측을 터치하면 우측으로 이동합니다. 자음놀이, 모음놀이, 낱말놀이는 게임 조작을 못하는 아이들을 위해 화면위에 자물쇠로 잠그면 중앙에서 일정하게 문자가 떨어지며 꺼지지 않고 계속 문자를 먹고 읽어 줍니다!! 한글먹기 게임은 5개의 life를 가지고 화면 상단 중앙에 출력되는 문자를 정확히 받아 먹으면 + 100점, 다른 문자를 먹으면 life 1감소, 아무것도 먹지않으면 점수 및 life 변화 없이 진행되는 형식의 게임입니다. 최초에는 2개의 문자가 떨어지고, 500점이 되면 3개의 문자, 1000점이 되면 4개의 문자, 2000점이 되면 5개의 문자, 3000점이 되면 6개의 문자, 4000점이 되면 7개의 문자, 5000점 이상은 8개의 문자가 떨어지며 정답 문자를 찾아 먹는 게임을 하며 한글 공부를 해요. 6세, 4세 자녀를 둔 2아이의 아빠가 아이들에게 만들어 준 어플!! 한글 먹기!! (4살짜리가 더욱더 좋아하네요~^^;) ---- 개발자 연락처 : 010-9981-0540 경기도 광주시 오포읍 신현리

"A uniquely addicting new take on the platforming genre, Happy Hamster is sure to please fans of runners everywhere." description: This app is specifically designed to show Purdue University West Lafayette students about how long it will take to walk from one campus building to another based on walking speed (2.7, 3.1, 3.5, or 3.75 mph). Most colleges allow only 10 minutes between courses and sometimes it takes longer than that to get to the next class. There are two ways to look up the time it will take to get from one building to the other. There is a map you can use to select the buildings. There is also a list of buildings you can choose from. Your position is shown on the map along with all of the campus buildings. Tapping on a building will bring up a list of other buildings to choose from indicating your destination. It will display four walking speeds and the time (in minutes) it will take to walk to the chosen building from the selected list.

description: Do you like killings pigs in Angry Birds or hitting cans in Can Knockdown? Maybe you will like this game too! This is a simple physics based game that requires the player to cause flags perched on top of blocks to tumble down and touch the ground. Sounds easy right? Well it’s not! As you progress through KTF’s 50 starting levels you will notice you will be progressively challenged by new and intricate scenarios! KTF is all about choice. As you progress further you will unlock new cannon balls and encounter different blocks with their own special traits and attributes. You are given a certain amount of ammo in each level, but how you use that ammo is up to you! Do you want to collapse those blocks with flags by hitting a weak point with the Mega Ball or do you want to try going directly for the double flag knockdown with a well placed hit from the Standard Ball? The choice is yours! For the ultimate challenge try achieving 3 gold cannon balls on each level! You can achieve 3 gold balls by having 3 or more ammo remaining. Two ammo remaining gives you two gold balls, and 1 ammo remaining gives you one gold ball. No hidden microtransactions or IAPs…. JUST PURE HOURS OF FUN!! COMPLETELY FREE!!!! Support for Windows/iOS coming soon!! Like our Facebook page at https://www.facebook.com/pages/Sempiternal-Studios/247438805379844?ref=hl Twitter: https://twitter.com/SempiternalStud Instagram: http://instagram.com/sempiternalstudios Game Features: - Dozens of levels - Full developer commitment! - Dynamic physics - Toony graphics and cool effects - 4 different cannon balls and 3 different blocks - Realtime shadows (not currently supported on any Tegra based devices, not recommended for lower end devices) - High replayability - 3 star rating system (stars are actually gold cannon balls) - Presents a good challenge, lots of fun! Permissions: - Network access: Used only to notify you of a game update. - Storage: Grants ability to write to SD card. - Phone status and identity: Google Analytic requires this permission. This will help us trace crashes and glitches in the game. Thanks to this we can fix issues faster and improve your gaming experience!

On your way , you have to collect all the Golden coins to get the maximum score and unlock the next level . We added many obstacle and traps in each levels at first its easy but in the next levels you will face different and difficultness challenge to clear all level . Maybe you need to retry some levels again and again if you miss a coin . We added spider trampolines in the game for fun and so That A ball can jump from one place to other . The controls are good and easy to use . Moving platform are there so usefull That ball can move from one place to other . Excellent Physics is used so the movement of the ball looks as realistic as possible . The camera is always on top of the ball , All which makes it simple to focus on the game play , you can change the camera view positions usefull accordion thing to your need. Its quite addictive brain logical game .

С помощью этого приложения Вы сможете прикоснуться к неизведанному, обратиться к звёздам, которые и помогут приоткрыть Вашу судьбу. Past. present and future ... Three faces that always accompany us. Of them coming - the most mysterious and subconscious. How many surprises in it, how many mysteries ... With this application, you can touch the unknown, refer to the stars, and that will help reveal your destiny.

Simply Fractions 2 is designed for second grade to fourth grade elementary students to further their understanding of fractions, it is the next step from the Simply Fractions app. Kids will learn about mixed fractions, equivalent fractions, fractions on a number line, a fraction of a collection whose size is greater than the denominator, compare fractions with different numerators and denominators, but can be compared to either 0, 1/2 or 1. We use a scaffolding approach, where the concept is introduced visually first, later there will be games without visual aid to strengthen the concept learned. The full version has eight different mini activities. The lite version has 2 mini activities, no ads are served in either versions. Here is a summary of the activities: 1. Shade Fractions 2: Like in Simply Fractions 1, you are asked to shade the squares, but the number of squares is larger then the denominator. They are arranged so you can easily see the grouping. 2. Mixed Fractions: You are presented with circles and a fraction of a circle, you will have to put in the correct whole number, numerator, denominator and the equivalent simple fraction's numerator and denominator. Since you are asked to put in the number rather than choosing from multiple choices, guessing is minimized. 3. Number Line: You have to put in the numerator based on the position on the number line, hints are provided so you will see the fraction on the number line is the same as a fraction of a whole. You will compare the fraction to a half, so you will be prepared to do the harder part of the compare exercises. 4. Fraction of a Set 2: Like in Simply Fractions, you are asked to color a fraction of objects, but the number of objects is larger than the denominator. You can rearrange the objects into separate groups so you can color the right amount of them. 5. Equivalent Fractions: You are asked to put in the numerator to make an equivalent fraction based on the visual model presented. 6. Compare: There are two modes, easy and hard. But in both modes you will need to rearrange the fractions into the right order. The easy mode, you will be asked to compare fractions with either the same numerators or the same denominators, these concepts were introduced in Simply Fractions, but here no visual aid is provided. The hard mode, the numerators and denominators are different, but they can be compared to a half, this is a crucial comparison strategy at this age. 7. Odd one out: You are provided with 4 fractions, you are to eliminate the one that is different than the other three equivalent fractions. 8. Equivalent memory: A classic memory game where you find pairs of equivalent fractions, this will strengthen the equivalent fractions skills. No kids should feel dumb because they don't understand math, many times we fail them because we let them learn the next concept before they grasped the first concept. We hope to instill confidence and joy in children as they travel the long educational journey. This app is optimized for both phones and tablets. Keywords: common core, fractions, second grade math, third grade math and fourth grade math

AccuScope® - The most innovative scope sight-in reference tool introduced in years. The AccuScope App was developed to take the guess work out of sighting in scopes and will automatically calculate the number of adjustment increments needed to accurately sight in your scope. The easy to use App gives you the exact number of "clicks" to get your scope dialed in quickly and accurately in just a few shots. For initial Sight-In or In the Field Adjustments, AccuScope will get you "On-Center". Gone are the days of wasted ammunition, expensive boresighters, and your valuable time associated with precisely sighting in your scope. The AccuScope App comes in two different versions. The Premium version was designed for any MOA, Metric or MilRad Scopes and any unit of measurement – Yards, Meters, Inches, Centimeters and Millimeters. The Standard version is identical to the Premium version, except it is dedicated to 1/4 MOA scopes. Given your scope’s MOA or Calibration number, your Shooting Distance, and pre-gathered Elevation (up/down) and Windage (left/right) off-center distances, AccuScope will "automatically" calculate the number of adjustment dial "clicks" needed to accurately sight in your scope. AccuScope works with all Ammunition. It does not matter whether it is a Rifle, Shotgun, Muzzleloader or Pistol. The AccuScope App will save you Time, Ammunition and Confusion. Purchase AccuScope® today and get the ACCUSCOPE® ADVANTAGE!

description: Make your fishing and hunting extremely effective with forecast from Fishing & Hunting Solunar Time! Based on the Solunar Tables theory application will help you to determine as precisely as possible the feeding of all types of fish and wildlife. Depending on the position of the moon and its phases and the position of the sun you will have the information about best time for fishing or hunting. Use Fishing & Hunting Solunar Time to plan your trips to fishing or hunting in order to maximize your chances of success! Save your favorite places using Fishing & Hunting Solunar Time for easy access to Solunar Forecasts in this places. description: My Land is a Sim Farm inspired simulation game from the makers of the award winning god simulation My Planet. You begin the game with a blank plot of land and $5000. From there, it is up to you to make it your own. You can create a farm with crops and animals, or you can create a commerce area with side walks and pizza stands, or you can create a nature park with lakes and trails. The choice is yours! In My Land, you may take up several avenues of revenue generation. You can do farming, business, or run a nature trail system. The farm is where the easiest money is to be made. There are no real rules to the simulation, so you can basically do anything you want to. Feel free to explore all that the game has to offer! My Land is designed for phones and tablets alike, and also comes with full gamepad support. It should work with most controllers, and is especially compatible with the Moga line of game controllers. No setup necessary for gamepad use, it just works! I consider My Land to be a game in progress, and as such, I am open to any and all suggestions on how to make it better. If you guys want it to be more farm oriented, I can add more farm related things. If you like the business and nature side, I can work on that too. If you would rather start seeing it move in a different direction, tell me in the comments! This game is for you guys! If you are looking for a nice laid back farm sim game and do not want to be bothered with constant in app purchase requirements and financial nags, then try My Land today!

It's features are. 1.   It's very interactive, super fun and educational and for toddlers. 2.   This nursery rhymes app has animations and wonderful music for your toddlers and kids. 3.   Kid's will love to sing and dance along with music and animations in this nursery rhymes. 4.   Target audience: Kids, preschoolers, toddlers and children of age group 2-6 yrs. 5.   9 English nursery rhymes/poems are bundled in this app.     Nursery Rhymes 1. Jingle Bells     Nursery Rhymes 2. Ringa, Ringa Roses     Nursery Rhymes 3. Ba, Baa, Black Sheep     Nursery Rhymes 4. Jack and Jill     Nursery Rhymes 5. One-two, Buckle my Shoe     Nursery Rhymes 6. Clap my Hands     Nursery Rhymes 7. I am a little tea pot     Nursery Rhymes 8. Hickory Dickory     Nursery Rhymes 9. Wheels on the Bus 3.    Enriched Multimedia:     a. Free, animated video with songs and music of popular nursery rhymes     c. Usage of cute cartoon characters to make the app interesting and fun loving.     d. Animation has songs and dance.     e. Attractive start-up interface featuring a Ferris wheel with tap-sensitive icons for each of the nine kindergarten poems. 4.   Lyrics displayed in sync with the music. A detailed outlook: Everyone was once a baby or a kid or a child. Hence, the magic of nursery poems is not an alien fact to anyone. This application is suitable not only for preschoolers but also for kids with age 1 year old, 2 years old, 3 years old, 4 year old and even for 5 and 6 years The idea of providing nursery rhyme in English with video and songs is a unique one in itself. When incorporated, this idea takes the form of a fantastic free kids’ app. The fact that some of the best baby nursery rhymes have been selected for this application has gone a long way in increasing the interest factor for children. Nursery Rhyme for Kids is a first-grade free learning app in the world of apps aimed at kid’s learning. It is also versatile since it can be termed as an effective learning game for kids, toddlers, even babies. Two rhymes are fully free, rest 7 can be unlocked through very minimal in-app purchase. The option to purchase single rhyme is also available.

Shooting Score is a simple and beautiful app to log and measure your shooting score for ISSF and Olympic 10M Air Rifle discipline. It is a very useful training aid for your daily shooting sessions. Shooting Score includes the following features: - QUICK DATA ENTERY Add individual session scores easily with minimal input. Choose between different number of total shots ( 30, 40 and 60 ) and record info about each series. - SESSION LIST You can store practically unlimited number of sessions and see the complete overview of all sessions and their score as a summary with statistical report - PERFORMANCE ANALYTICS A graphical analysis of all shooting scores including trend analysis and goal setting to help you progress - SHOOTING TIMER Practice shooting with the timer to achieve required intervals of shooting time and breathing techniques for competition

The Benton Arkansas Police Department (BNPD) proudly serves the residents of Benton Arkansas. Our mission is to provide our community with a professional, progressive, community-oriented police department. We strive to serve our citizens with the utmost courtesy and concern for their needs with an emphasis on integrity and fairness. We conduct ourselves in such a manner as to instill confidence and pride in the Benton Police Department by the community. We strive to protect the constitutional rights of everyone. Our purpose is to create an atmosphere of safety and security in our community. Our new mobile App is completely free and allows you to connect to BNPD alerts, messages, services, and support. Please let us know if there is anything we can do to improve the App to serve you better. NOTE: The App must not be used in an emergency. Dial 911 to receive immediate assistance. Features of the Benton Police Department App: - Get urgent updates and Amber Alerts - Submit a tip to the BNPD - Request a Home Security Check - Get details, contact information and directions to our facilities - View local missing children - Get the BNPD Department Directory - View currently housed inmates - View our Most Wanted - Get the latest events from BNPD - Get a listing of local sex offenders - Record voice notes for later review of a scene - Send a photo tip to the BNPD - Friend us on Facebook and Follow us on Twitter - View the latest BNPD Videos
release_text: May 12, 2014 - Initial Release May 22, 2014 - Bug Fixes

description: The Jacksonville Police Department proudly serves the residents of Jacksonville, Arkansas. Our department has a total of 80 sworn police officers, 19 civilian personnel, 10 auxiliary officers, and 5 civilian chaplains that all work together to provide the citizens of Jacksonville a professional department that they deserve. The men and women of the Jacksonville Police Department have dedicated their lives to accomplish our simply stated mission: “To Protect Property and the Lives of Our Citizens for a Better Jacksonville.” Our new mobile App is completely free and allows you to connect to Jacksonville Police Department alerts, messages, services, codes, personnel and support. Please let us know if there is anything we can do to improve the App to serve you better. NOTE: The App must not be used in an emergency. Dial 911 to receive immediate assistance. Features of the Jacksonville Police Department App: - Get urgent updates and Amber Alerts - Submit a tip to the Jacksonville Police - Request a Home Security Check - Get details, contact information and directions to our facilities - Report an Issue or Concern - View or Events Calendar - Get Accident and Incident Reports - View Jacksonville Crime Statistics - View local missing children - Get the Department Directory - View currently housed inmates - View our Most Wanted List - Get the latest news - Search for local sex offenders - Record voice notes for later review of a scene - Send a photo tip to the Police Department - Friend us on Facebook and Follow us on Twitter - Review Jacksonville Municipal Codes - Review Jacksonville Code Enforcement - Review Arkansas State Codes
release_text: May 13, 2014 - Initial Release May 22, 2014 - Bug Fixes April 22, 2015 - Feature Updates, bug fixes

description: At Jukebox, we provide our customers the opportunity to enjoy special moment reminiscent of years gone by. We serve classic, tasty food and treat our guests so that they have a memorable time with us. Our App will let you in on special deals, our menu and many other options. Find out about our catering services and how you can set up your own parties in our place. We're all about bringing back memories and creating new ones. - View our entire menu on-the-go - See our schedule and upcoming events - Follow us on our integrated Facebook and Twitter pages - Submit photos of yourself at Jukebox to display on the app gallery - Find places of interest nearby - Use the conveniently simple tip calculator anytime - Get one-touch calling to Jukebox Burgers - Earn loyalty coupons and specials - Share with others on our Testimonials Wall - Suggest ways on how we can improve and serve you better

Use the Game Stats feature to keep track of player statistics during the game. Also, keep track of live scoring updates from around the state. Complete player rosters and schedules from all 43 SC Midlands area teams. Looking for a stadium? Use the GPS-Enabled Directions tab to find it. Useful features include: -Individual Team Schedules -Facebook and Twitter Integrations -One-click Share Features -Game Calendar -Team Rosters -FCA Info -GPS-Enabled Directions -Stat Sheets -Live Scores -College Scholarship and recruiting information -Plus much, much more!

Sweets Mania is a brand new candies game! Clear two or more same candies to score points, try to link more same candies to make more combos! It's easy, enjoyable but very challenging! Features: - 64 challenging levels and many game props - Easy to play for all ages - The Fire props can clear candies in one row - The Water props can clear candies around - The Ice props can unfreeze the frozen candies - Sweet game graphics and cool animation effects Challenge the most legendary candies game!

Check out the temporary price cut to celebrate the latest release! Golf Frontier GPS is a premium golf application for your Android device. So much more than a golf GPS rangefinder, in addition to knowing the distance to the green and hazards from anywhere on the course, you can use the application to track scores for your group, record your statistics, and calculate your golf handicap. It's the only golf app you will ever need! Over 30,000 golf courses are currently available for download and more are being added every day (visit http://www.golffrontier.com/GPSCourseMaps.aspx for a list of currently mapped courses). If your course is not already listed in the directory, then you can either create a map for the course online at http://www.golffrontier.com using our powerful online editing tools, or send us an email and we will map it for you. Unlike other apps, there is never any additional charge to download courses. Check out the User Guide: http://www.golffrontier.com/golffrontierGPS_userguide.pdf Golf Frontier Features Include: - Easy to understand and read view of all targets for the current hole with Carry and/or Reach distances clearly specified. - Enhanced Map view with detailed overlay information. Distance arcs placed at 100, 150 and 200 yards/meters. Maps are rotated to show the green at the top of the screen (Please note that map view requires an active data connection). - Painlessly get accurate approach and layup distances to and from any location - Track your score, number of putts, fairways and greens in regulation. - Additionally, track number of chip shots, first putt distance, sand saves and penalty strokes. - Track scores for up to three additional golfers. - Equipment tracking. Add details for each club in your bag, record the distance you hit each club, and then reference this information while playing. You can also record the drive and approach clubs used on every hole. - Measurement tool for accurately measuring shot distances. - Record your scores using Strokeplay or Matchplay scoring and calculate Stableford points. - Automatically calculate your handicap. USGA, CONGU, EGU and AGU (Australian Golf Association) Handicap Calculations are currently supported. - Quickly and easily view an electronic scorecard of every round of golf you have played using the application, including a summary, statistics and comments for that round. - View your career statistics and get comprehensive golf game analysis online at http://www.golffrontier.com - Auto hole transition, as you reach the green for each hole, the GPS will automatically move to the next one. - All distances displayed in either yards or meters. - GPS sensitivity adjustment that allows you to configure the optimum accuracy and battery life setup for your phone, including "most frequent" mode for ultimate accuracy. - Quickly find new courses for download from the course library by searching via by course name, city and postal code or nearest location. - Separate option to always keep the screen on. - Golf Frontier GPS can conveniently be installed on the SD card. - Multiple User Interface Themes - Multiple Language Support (English, Swedish and Spanish) ***Our Guarantee*** Golf Frontier is dedicated to producing the highest quality Android Golf application possible. Have a problem or a complaint? Let us know at contact@golffrontier.com and we will make sure it gets resolved in a timely manner. Please note: Support for this product is currently available only in English.

description: Fun game for babies. Play with bubbles and balloons.

Baby explorer is a fun learning program for children of all ages. Contains 17 games in one: - Sound animated learning of letters and numbers. - Learn to recognize animals and their sounds. - Distinguish shapes and colors and match the pieces. - Distinguish between colors and show your ability to move animated balls around the screen. - Practice your memory with fruits learning mode. - Match the pictures and play with wooden pieces. - Learn the sounds of musical instruments and play their music. - Create your first musical melodies playing the xylophone. - Play puzzles with pictures of your environment. - Play with butterflies, fish and other animals. - Have lots of fun with soap bubbles and balloons. - Draw funny pictures with lots of pencils and colors. - Listen and learn the funny sounds of the most familiar vehicles. - Improve reflexes flying a toy plane. Children can have fun playing for a long time. you can also acquire the following skills by playing this game: - Improve children's skills of memory, concentration and development of knowledge of their environment. - Help with the recognition of the letters in the alphabet. - Keep children entertained with fun sound effects and animal sounds, musical instruments and vehicles .. - The game is adapted to be handled easily. - It's specifically designed as an educational tool interface for preschoolers and up.

Free your phone from potential concerns and ads! This app detects all annoyances of apps installed on your phone, such as Push Notifications, Desktop icon spam ads and apps with privacy concerns. It identifies the adware and spyware and allows you to then remove it. - Helps you to get rid of annoying ad notifications and bookmarks on your desktop. - Become aware of what apps have permissions to access your messages or accounts and could thus invade your privacy, or can use services which could cost you money, and helps you with their removal. This app detects over 70 different aspects of apps, including: - Concerns such as Push Notifications (both ads and non-ads), putting spam icons on your desktop, and privacy related concerns such as the ability to access your location, contacts, messages or accounts. - Android Ad Networks; this app tells you which ad networks are embedded in apps, such as Admob, Millennial Media, ChartBoost, TapJoy and many smaller ones. Indicates which ones may have push ads. - Social SDKs; detect whether apps have SDKs like Facebook, VKontakte, Twitter, and more. - Developer Tools; detect libraries like Google Analytics, Flurry Analytics, Google Play in-app billing, Android support library, ACRA, Phonegap, and many more.
release_text: Version 2.1 - Better detection of Admob - More libraries are detected, eg Google Games Version 2.0: - Scan & Google Play: When clicking ads or links to Google Play you have the choice to get immediate feedback about potential concerns in the app you're viewing. See http://www.appbrain.com/info/google-play-scanner for more details - Notification Manager (only for Android 4.3 and up): auto-blocks push ads and allows you to manage which apps' notifications get filtered

Amazing Earth provides a list of spectacular places to view in Google Earth on your Android device. Google Earth must be installed on your device for this application to function. If you have a dual core device then remember to enable the 3D layers in Google Earth! This app runs a web server on your device at http://localhost:8002/ to serve KMZ files to Google Earth. KMZ files and images courtesy of http://kmzlinks.com . Icon based on image at http://visibleearth.nasa.gov . Java web server based on example from http://turtlemeat.com .
release_text: Amazing Earth showcases great KMZ files that are featured at http://kmzlinks.com. Starts Google Earth directly, skipping the dialog asking which application to use to view the KMZ file.

description: KMLZ to Earth allows you to view KML and KMZ files on your Android device using Google Earth. If you are unable to view a KML or KMZ file or attachment in Google Earth, then this is the app that you need! KMLZ to Earth allows you to browse through your local files to select a KML or KMZ file to display in Google Earth. It also allows you to view your saved email attachments in Google Earth. In the Explorer activity, if you browse to a directory containing images with location information, * Tap the file icon to view the photo closely * Tap the file name to create a KMZ file * Tap "View images to create KMZ" to create a KMZ file with the locations and images from multiple photos In your email application, save the KML or KMZ file, and then tap it again to choose to view it with KMLZ to Earth. Since Google Earth for Android doesn't seem to have published limits on file sizes, your success with files larger than 4MB may vary. Large files cause Google Earth to to load slowly, or if they are too large, not display them entirely. If this occurs, try to reduce the size of the images used or the number of images selected to create smaller KMZ files.  The size of the images shown in Google Earth decreases progressively as the total size of images are selected, in order to keep the total file size small enough to view on Google Earth for Android. When creating a KMZ file, each image containing location information is shown as a thumbnail, along with the image name, time taken, resolution and size. Thumbnails can be tapped for a larger preview of the image. All, none, or individual files can be selected to create a KMZ file from images in one directory. DO NOT PUT SPACES OR OTHER STRANGE CHARACTERS IN FILE NAMES! LETTER, NUMBER, UNDERSCORE, PERIOD, AND HYPHEN CHARACTERS ALLOWED. ANY ILLEGAL CHARACTERS WILL BE REPLACED WITH UNDERSCORES. File names must end in ".jpg", ".kml", ".kmz" to be visible to view in KMLZ to Earth, and capitalization does not matter. Files that you select to view are copied to the "Home" directory, typically /mnt/sdcard/kmlz. WARNING! Any file that does not end in ".kml" or ".kmz" will be deleted automatically from this directory, or when you choose to use Menu, Clear Home, and confirm. The Home button will take you quickly to the /mnt/sdcard/kmlz directory (or a similar path) to see which files you have previously viewed, and view them again. This app can't be set as default for any action, if you try, then it will reset itself. This ensures you the choice of action always and prevents a possible undesirable loop. If experiencing problems with Google Earth, use the Menu, Manage Earth, and either Force Stop, Clear Data, or Clear Cache. Clear Cache is very helpful to get accurate results if you are testing the same file name multiple times. Likewise, if experiencing problems with KMLZ to Earth, use the Menu, Manage KMZL, and either Force Stop, Clear Data, or Clear Cache. This application runs a web server on your device at http://localhost:8001/ to serve pages from it's "Home" directory to Google Earth. In order to do this, it will have a running process in the background. A notification will be issued to remind you that this process is running. If you view the notification, then you return to the application, where pressing back will allow you to terminate the application and the background web server process.
release_text: Improved handling of illegal characters in file names causing "Not Found" error. Major update to appearance and function of all activities and dialogs bringing improved performance and usability. New landscape layouts with improved usage of space created for both Explorer and Creator activities. Individual photos with EXIF information now appear in Explorer activity allowing KMZ files to be created easily for a single photo.

description: Download an instrument! Beat Box is a soundboard like you've never used before - you're in control. Record sounds to any of the 8 tiles and play them back however you like! You can also create new boards for entirely different sets of sounds to save them for later. HOW TO USE: 1 - Press the middle button to go to the menu. 2 - Select or create your board from the title bar and press "RECORD" 3 - Record a sound to a tile by holding down a tile and making a sound. 4 - Go back to the menu, press "PLAY" and play the sounds by pressing the tiles! You can make this app anything you want, like a soundboard or a full on beat pad. Have fun and get creative!!

description: ★ Google Play Featured and Staff Picks ★ 1 of 45 Best New Android Game chosen by Android Police. ★ "AppXplore created a great puzzle game with Sporos. Addicting and challenging." - NWCN, 5/5 ★ "A slow-paced puzzle for the thinker" - CNET, 4/5 (Excellent) Sporos is a simple yet challenging puzzle game. The objective is to light up the cells in each level with a special seed known as the sporos. Players drag pieces onto the board one at a time, arranging them to extend all the way down every row and column. Sporos demands a mix of skill, luck, and logic; in order to succeed, players will conduct clever experiments like scientists in a lab. The soothing electronic music helps you keep your cool, while the colorful graphics lend the game a spacey, biological vibe. Sporos starts off easy, but with hundreds of levels and multiple solutions for each, it will take a true puzzle genius to master this stylish, colorful app. FEATURES: • Simple-yet-challenging puzzle gaming • Futuristic theme with neon "biological" graphics • 400 levels in Essential Labs for free – starts off simple and gets increasingly tricky • Google Play Game Services with 20 Achievements • Hints for purchase, just in case you get stuck • More levels in the months to come!

description: If you’re looking for good places to cruise and enjoy the diversity of Britain’s canals and countryside, we’ve created the free to download Canal Boat Cruise Guide to provide you with some top-notch ideas and destinations. Brought to you by the team behind Britain’s best waterways magazine, Canal Boat, we’ve looked at our wonderful waterways from the beautiful Kennet & Avon in the south, through the industrial Midlands to the north and the scenic majesty of the Leeds & Liverpool. Along the way we visit the majestic River Thames, the rural charms of the Stratford Canal, some of the amazing urban waterways of Birmingham and the mighty Trent & Mersey. With great pictures and useful information including boatyards and marinas along the navigations, this guide has plenty to help you choose where to cruise. We hope this app will help you make even more of your enjoyment of Britain’s beautiful canals and rivers.

Ever wanted to swim with the fishes or get eye-to-eye with a shark? Then scuba diving is the sporting activity for you. You might already be a keen watersports enthusiast, but if you’ve only ever stayed on the surface then you are missing a whole new world just ripe for exploring. And if you have remained on terra-firma till now, then come on down and take the plunge. Getting certified to scuba dive has never been easier - you can become a PADI Open Water Diver in just four days. A PADI Open Water Diver certification - and subsequent higher levels of training - is your passport to the world of diving, and your C-card will open the door to exotic locations in far-flung destinations and diving opportunities closer to home. And with more than 5,000 PADI dive centres in 180 countries, you are never going to be short of places to visit! Over the following pages, you’ll find comprehensive information about the PADI courses available to you, and a ‘beginner’s guide to equipment’ to help you make sense of all that gear! We’ve also pulled together details of dive sites around the UK coastline and across the world that are suitable for newly qualified divers, so wherever you live or go on holiday, there is sure to be a dive site near you! This great free guide is presented to you by Sport Diver magazine, the official magazine of the PADI Diving Society in the UK. For a regular fix of diving news, kit reviews, dive sites and much more you'll find the Sport Diver magazine app on the App store by searching for 'Sport Diver Magazine'.

The MEDRILLs (U.S. Army Medic) Needle Chest Decompression app is a highly interactive training tool for initial training and skill sustainment of task 081-833-3007 for U.S. Army Health Care Specialists (Combat Medic, MOS 68W). Each MEDRILLs App covers a 68W (Army Combat Medic) task and consist of 3 modes: • Instruction Mode – Multimedia instructional animation that covers the injury, diagnosis, and treatment • Training Mode – A series Interactive exercises focused on ‘key point’ of each subtask. Each exercise takes a subtask’s key point and transforms it into an active learning exercise on the touchscreen interface. • Testing mode – Ensure trainees can correctly compete the task. It tests trainees using the same exercises as training mode but grades them in accordance with the task’s Go/No-Go criteria. All training is the app is in accordance with STP 8-68W13-SM-TG “SOLDIER'S MANUAL AND TRAINER'S GUIDE, MOS 68W, HEALTH CARE SPECIALIST SKILL LEVELS 1, 2 AND 3”
release_text: Rebuilt for Android 4.2. Ability to skip intro. Misc bug fixes.

description: Medrills: Cardiac Emergencies The EMT task of identifying cardiac emergencies is fully illustrated using 3D graphics and interactive exercises to reinforce key learning concepts. This lesson will help the EMS provider in further assessing a patient with potential cardiac conditions in order to provide the most adequate treatment. Medrills, presented by ArchieMD, provides compelling training material for preventive and general medical tasks such as obtaining IV access, performing CPR, or using an AED. The app is dedicated to an individual medical task and includes:​ 1. An instructional animation providing a deep understanding of the medical task. 2. Training with interactive exercises which enable practicing the task to prepare for assessment. 3. In-app purchase of $0.99 for a testing section to evaluate the user’s knowledge and skill of a task. Score above 85% with no critical task failures to receive a certificate for nationally recognized 1.0 CEH credit hour certified by CECBEMS. NOTE – IN ORDER TO RECEIVE CEH CREDIT HOURS, AN ADDITIONAL CHARGE OF $0.99 MUST BE MADE AS AN IN-APP PURCHASE. USERS WHO DO NOT PURCHASE THE CEH AND TESTING MODE MAY VIEW THE INSTRUCTIONAL VIDEO AND TRAINING MODE BUT WILL NOT BE PARTICIPATING IN A CECBEMS ACCREDITED COURSE. CECBEMS verifies that sound education principles have been demonstrated in the development of this educational offering as evidenced by the review of its objectives, teaching plan, faculty, and program evaluation processes. description: Medrills: Primary Assessment The Paramedic and EMT task of Primary Trauma Assessment is fully illustrated using 3D graphics and interactive exercises to reinforce key learning concepts. This lesson includes: Forming a scene size-up, identifying immediate life threats, assessment of both a responsive and unresponsive patient, and initial assessment of a patient's airway, breathing, and circulation. Medrills, presented by ArchieMD, provides compelling training material for preventive and general medical tasks such as obtaining IV access, performing CPR, or using an AED. The app is dedicated to an individual medical task and includes:​ 1. An instructional animation providing a deep understanding of the medical task. 2. Training with interactive exercises which enable practicing the task to prepare for assessment. 3. In app purchase of $1.99 for a testing section to evaluate the user’s knowledge and skill of a task. Score above 85% with no critical task failures to receive a certificate for nationally recognized 1.5 CEH credit hour certified by CECBEMS. description: The Best App Ever Awards 2011 WINNER - The Best Adventure Game POCKET GAMER BRONZE AWARD! ANDROIDCENTRAL.com: GRave Defense HD is a damn good tower defense game! ANDROIDTAPP.com: GRave Defense HD an Extremely Addictive Tower Defense Game ANDROIDPIT.com: GRave Defense HD - Tower Defense at its best! * 40 HD Levels!!! * *** In case of any issues just write to info@artofbytes.com . Thank you for support! *** Grave Defense HD is the next step in the evolution of tower defense games for the mobile platform! It takes the best qualities from other tower defense games and adds many new features as well! It is an old-school hardcore game for Android only! Grave Defense HD has something that all those "others" don't: A storyline! Follow the harrowing encounters of the Fellowship of Survivals with mutated zombies and formidable boss monsters! A post-apocalyptic world destroyed by a nuclear war, hordes of zombies hunger for human flesh. But zombies aren't the only threats you'll encounter! Face off against some of History's most notorious baddies, like Dracula and Frankenstein! Obliterate mutant hordes across 40 levels using fire, electricity, lasers and more! Each battlefield is unique: Visit exotic locations like the Amazon Rainforest, the Bermuda Triangle and even an alien space! You must use your limited types of towers, some much more powerful than others, and evolving strategies and tactics to survive! Are you ready to be Humanity's last, best, and only chance for survival??? Lock and load soldier, and get ready for GRave Defense HD to blow your mind!!! Why GRave Defense HD? - Amazing high-res graphics! All levels, towers, mutants, special effects and achievements now in HD!! - Military Ranks! Climb the militant ladder, all the way to the "Top"! - Survival mode: - More tower upgrades! - Earn more points and get the High Score! - Online ranking system! - Four difficulty modes, from Casual to INSANE!!

description: Search and find all the words hidden in the grid. In this search word puzzle you can choose between eight difficulty level, play in timer mode and compare your scores with your friends and people around the world. All puzzles are automatically generated by the app for endless fun These are the game levels: Level 1: search horizontally, vertically Level 2: search horizontally, vertically and backwards Level 3: search horizontally, vertically and diagonally Level 4: search horizontally, vertically and diagonally and backwards Level 5: search horizontally, vertically with change of direction Level 6: search horizontally, vertically, backwards, with change of direction Level 7: search horizontally, vertically, diagonally with change of direction Level 8: search horizontally, vertically, diagonally, backwards with change of direction

Jewels Blast – The ultimate match-3 puzzle game! Playing today & try to get best position in Global leader board (worldwide community) Jewels Blast (Jewels Dash) is a Match-3 game with creative gameplay & features. In Action mode, try to match as many jewels as you can in 60 seconds, get special gift or tap large block of diamonds to earn bonus scores. In Endless mode, you can enjoy addictive levels but very challenging mission to get high scores. **** How to Play Jewels Blast (Jewels Dash) **** - Tap on any 3 or more connected identical diamonds to remove them. The more diamonds you connect, the more points you get - Be careful with wrong tapping (1 or 2 block of diamonds), it will reduce your time! - Try to get special diamonds that contain bomb, thunder, extra time, super color pop, double score to get more points & great effects - Move gift box to the bottom of the puzzle to get more points **** MAIN FEATURES of Jewels Blast (Jewels Dash) **** + Maximize your points in 60-second Action mode. You can get extra time in special diamond. + Try to pass as many levels as you can in Endless mode. Each level you have a target score and 60 seconds to play. + Special diamonds: Bomb to explode a 9-cells, Thunder Vertical to clear column of diamonds, Thunder Horizontal to clear row of diamonds, Extra Time (add 5 seconds), Color Pop to blast all jewels have save color, Double Score you get in 7 seconds. + Global leader board to rank with other players on community in mode Action & Endless. Try to play & get top position worldwide! + Share your high score via Facebook to show with your friends + Smoothly & amazing effects + Lovely background sounds & interaction sounds + Save last played level in Endless mode so that you can move on next level easily + Weather change in puzzle when you get rain, snow, desert diamonds Tag: jewels, diamond, match-3 game If you love match-3 games & diamond games, you must try Jewels Blast (Jewels Dash)! Have fun and enjoy the game. **** Please Note **** This game is free now and forever. We have added banner ads from Admob & interstitial ads from StartApp to earn some cents. Please understand this. Thanks for your supporting. **** OUR CONTACT for Jewels Blast (Jewels Dash) **** To help us to meet your expectations about this jewels game, please send your feedback to: asqteam.mobile@gmail.com Best wishes to you. ASQTeam
release_text: * Fix minor bugs. Thanks for playing Jewels Blast. Best wishes to you.
